T02bsu030_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
T02bsu030_u:7: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavānanekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma //
T02bsu030_u:8: atha khalu tasyāmeva parṣadi suvikrāntavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ
T02bsu030_u:9: sa utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
T02bsu030_u:10: pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśam, saced bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭaśca praśnavyākaraṇāya /
T02bsu030_u:11: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃstathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yadyadevākāṅkṣasi /
T02bsu030_u:12: ahaṃ te tasya tasyaiva praśna(sya) vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi //
T02bsu030_u:15: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitetyucyate? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati? kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya
T02bsu030_u:17: sarvamārakarmāṇi cāvabudhyate? kīdṛgrūpaiśva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāvihārairviharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ
T02bsu030_u:19: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu suvikrāntavikrāmin, yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchasi bodhisattvānāṃ (Vaidya 2)
T02bsu030_u:20: mahāsattvānāmarthāya, yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bahujanahitāya pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
T02bsu030_u:21: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, etarhyanāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ
T02bsu030_u:23: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kiṃ tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃstathāgatametadarthaṃ paripṛcchasi? evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ sarvasattvahitāya sarvasattvānukampāyai tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ grāhikā yaduta
T02bsu030_u:26: tatra ye sattvā niyatāḥ śrāvakayāne bhaviṣyanti, te kṣipramanāsravāṃ bhūmiṃ
T02bsu030_u:28: ye pratyekabuddhayāne niyatā bhaviṣyanti, te kṣipraṃ pratyekabuddhayānena niryāsyanti /
T02bsu030_u:31: ye ca anavakrāntasamyaktvaniyāmā aniyatāstisṛṣu bhūmiṣu, te śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayiṣyanti /
T02bsu030_u:32: sarvasattvānāṃ ca bhagavan kuśalamūlasaṃjananaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgatena imaṃ prajñāpāramitāpraśnaṃ visarjayatā /
T02bsu030_u:33: na ca vayaṃ bhagavan hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ, na daridracittānām,
T02bsu030_u:34: daridramānasasamanvāgatānām, na kusīdānām, na kausīdyābhibhūtānām, na
T02bsu030_u:36: nāsaṃlekhasamanvāgatānām, na muṣitasmṛtīnām, na bhrāntacittānām, na
T02bsu030_u:37: kāmapaṅkamagnānām, na śaṭhānām, na māyāvinām, nākṛtajñānām, na
T02bsu030_u:38: pāpecchānām, na pāpasamācārāṇām, na śīlavipannānām, nāpariśuddhaśīlānām,
T02bsu030_u:39: na dṛṣṭivipannānām, na māragocaracāriṇām, nātmotkarṣakāṇām, na
T02bsu030_u:40: parapaṃsakānām, na lābhasatkāragurukāṇām, na pātracīvarādhyavasitānām, na
T02bsu030_u:41: kuhakānām, na lapakānām, na naimittikānām, na naiṣpeṣikāṇām, na lābhena lābhacikīrṣukāṇām
T02bsu030_u:42: na vayaṃ bhagavan evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:44: prārthayanti, asaṅgajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamasamajñānamanuttarajñānaṃ prārthayante, ye nātmānamupalabhante na param, kutaḥ punarātmānamutkarṣayiṣyanti paraṃ vā pasaṃyiṣyanti, teṣāṃ nihatamānānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavaṃśchinnaviṣāṇavṛṣabhopamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
T02bsu030_u:45: mahāsattvānāmāvrīḍhaśalyānāṃ nīcamānasānāṃ caṇḍālakumārakopamacittānāṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśasamacitānāṃ bhagavan sattvānāmarthāya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
T02bsu030_u:46: ye dharmamapi nopalabhante nābhiniviśante kutaḥ punaradharmam, teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya
T02bsu030_u:47: tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmāśayaśuddhānāmaśaṭhānāmamāyāvināmṛjukānāṃ samacittānāṃ sarvasattvahitāmukampakānāṃ samādāpakānāṃ samuttejakānāṃ saṃpraharṣakāṇāṃ mahābhāravāhikānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ mahākṛtyena pratyupasthitānāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ sarvasattvahitasukhāvahānāṃ nāyakānāṃ vināyakānāṃ pariṇāyakānāṃ sarvadharmāniśritavihārikāṇāṃ sarvopapattyāyatanānarthikānāṃ sarvamārapāśavinirmuktānāṃ (Vaidya 3) chandikānāṃ vīryavatāmapramattānāṃ sarvadharmaparamapāramiprāptānāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedanakuśalānām /
T02bsu030_u:49: vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
T02bsu030_u:50: ye te bhagavan sattvā bodhijñānamapi na manyante nābhiniviśante nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhanti, sarvamanyanāsamatikrāntā mārgasthitā mārgapratipannā mārgadaiśikāḥ, teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca /
T02bsu030_u:51: sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya hitāya sukhāya yogakṣemāya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ, sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan
T02bsu030_u:53: tena vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayacchittyarthaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:55: bhavitukāmāḥ, niḥsaṃśayāśca bhagavan sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃśayaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayitukāmāḥ
T02bsu030_u:58: na ca vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kiṃcidanyatsukhaṃ samanupaśyāmo 'nyatra prajñātaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:59: na cānyatkiṃcidbhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ sukhamasti anyatra bodhisattvayānānmahāyānāt /
T02bsu030_u:60: tena vayaṃ bhagavan imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhamupasaṃhartukāmāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:61: bodhisattvānāṃ caitamarthaṃ bhagavan samanupaśyadbhirasmābhistathāgata etamarthaṃ paripṛṣṭaḥ
T02bsu030_u:62: evamukte bhagavām suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvāṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu suvikrāntavikrāmin /
T02bsu030_u:63: guṇānāṃ te na sukaraḥ paryanto 'dhigantum, yastvaṃ tathāgataṃ mahato janakāyasyānukampayā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchasi /
T02bsu030_u:64: tena hi tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru, bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
T02bsu030_u:65: sādhu bhagavanniti suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ////
T02bsu030_u:67: prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti bhagavannucyate, kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitetyucyata iti, na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kenaciddharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā vacanīyā sarvavacanātikrāntā hi prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:68: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā śakyate vaktum - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā, asya vā prajñāpāramitā, anena vā prajñāpāramitā, asmādvā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:70: prajñaiva suvikrāntavikrāmiṃstathāgatena na labdhā, nopalabdhā, kutaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupalapsyate? prajñeti suvikrāntavikrāmin ajñaiṣā
T02bsu030_u:72: katamā ca suvikrāntavikrāmin ajānanā sarvadharmāṇām? anyathaite sarvadharmā anyathābhilapyante, na cābhilāpavinirmuktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:74: sarvadharmāṇām, yā ca ajānanā sarvadharmāṇām, na sā śakyā vācā vaktum /
T02bsu030_u:75: api tu yathā sattvā ajānanāḥ, tenocyate prajñeti /
T02bsu030_u:81: prajñeti suvikrāntavikrāmin naiṣā ajñā nāpyanajñā, nāpyajñānajñā,
T02bsu030_u:88: jñānamajñānataḥ, nāpi jñānato 'jñānam, nāpi jñānamajñānam, nāpyajñānaṃ jñānam /
T02bsu030_u:90: ajñānena hi jñānamityucyate, na tu tatra kiṃcidajñānaṃ yacchakyamādarśayitum - idaṃ tajjñānam, asya vā tajjñānam, anena vā tajjñānam /
T02bsu030_u:91: tena tajjñānaṃ jñānatvena na saṃvidyate, nāpi tajjñānaṃ tattvenāvasthitam, nāpyajñānaṃ jñānamityucyate /
T02bsu030_u:93: jñānamityucyeta, tataḥ sarve bālapṛthagjanā jñānino bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:97: tatkasmāt? na hi jñānaṃ vacanīyam, nāpi jñānaṃ kasyacidviṣayaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:98: sarvaviṣayavyatikrāntaṃ hi jñānam, na ca jñānaṃ viṣayam (yaḥ?) /
T02bsu030_u:99: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin jñānanirdeśaḥ, adeśo 'pradeśaḥ, yena jñānenāsau jñānināṃ jñānīti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T02bsu030_u:103: iyamucyate lokottarā prajñeti, na punaryathocyate lokottarā prajñeti /
T02bsu030_u:104: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? loka eva nopalabhyate, kutaḥ punarlokottarā prajñā? kaḥ punarvādo yo lokān samanuttariṣyati lokottarayā prajñayā? tatkasya hetoḥ?
T02bsu030_u:105: na hi sā lokamupalabhate, tena na kiṃciduttārayati, tenocyate lokottarā prajñeti /
T02bsu030_u:109: tatkasya hetoḥ? aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate ya uttartavyo yena cottartavyaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:111: lokottare hi na loko vidyate na lokottaram,
T02bsu030_u:113: ayamucyate suvikrāntavikrāmin lokottarāyāḥ prajñāyā nirdeśaḥ, na punaryathocyate lokottarā prajñeti /
T02bsu030_u:114: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi yā lokottarā sā vacanīyā,
T02bsu030_u:116: na tatra bhūyaḥ kiṃciduttartavyam, tenocyate lokottarā prajñeti //
T02bsu030_u:117: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin yā nirvedhikā prajñā, kiṃ sā prajñā nirvidhyati?
T02bsu030_u:120: prajñapyeta - iyaṃ sā prajñā yā nirvidhyatīti /
T02bsu030_u:121: na kenacidvidhyate nāvidhyate, na kasyaciduttaramupalabhyate yadvidhyeta /
T02bsu030_u:122: nirvidhyatīti nātra kiṃcidvidhyati nāvidhyati, nātra kiṃcidvidhyate nāvidhyate,
T02bsu030_u:126: nirvidhyati nirvedhikā prajñetyucyate nirvidhyati na kvaciddhāvati, na vidhāvati, na saṃdhāvati, tenocyate nirvedhiketi /
T02bsu030_u:127: api tu suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvedhikā prajñeti kiṃ
T02bsu030_u:133: yaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgato vidhyati, sa traidhātukaṃ (Vaidya 5) vidhyati /
T02bsu030_u:138: yenaivaṃ traidhātukaṃ nirviddham, ayamucyate nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgata iti /
T02bsu030_u:139: kathaṃ ca nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgataḥ? na hi kiṃcinnirveddhavyamakuśalam, sa sarvaṃ kuśalamiti nirvidhyati, nairvedhikyā prajñayā atikrāmati /
T02bsu030_u:140: sa evaṃ nairvedhikyā prajñyā samanvāgato yatkiṃcitpaśyati śṛṇoti jighrati āsvādayati spṛśati vijānīte vā, tatsarvaṃ nirvidhyati /
T02bsu030_u:142: nirvidhyati? anityato duḥkhato gaṇḍato rogataḥ śalyataḥ śūnyato aghata āghātataḥ parataḥ (pralopataḥ) pralopadharmataścalataḥ prabhaṅgurato 'nātmato 'nutpādato 'nirodhato 'lakṣaṇata iti /
T02bsu030_u:144: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin viśalyā nāma bhaiṣajyajātiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:145: sā yasmin sthāpyate tataḥ sarvaśalyānyapanayati nirvidhyati, evameva evaṃrūpairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato
T02bsu030_u:146: bhikṣurviśalyaḥ śītībhūto nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgataḥ saṃsārātyantavihārī nairvedhikaprajñoviraktaḥ
T02bsu030_u:148: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vajraṃ yasminneva nikṣipyate nirvedhanārtham, tattadeva nirvidhyati, evameva bhikṣurvajropamasamādhinairvedhikyā prajñayā parigṛhītaṃ (cittaṃ?) yatra sthāpayati yeṣu ca pracārayati, tān sarvānnirvidhyati /
T02bsu030_u:149: sa nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgato lokottarayā samyagduḥkhakṣayagāminyānuliptastravidya ityucyate /
T02bsu030_u:152: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vaidyaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tantraupayikayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgataḥ syāt sarvabhaiṣajyakuśalaḥ sarvavyādhyutpattikuśalaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocanakaḥ sa yaṃ yameva glānaṃ cikitsati taṃ tameva mocayat /
T02bsu030_u:155: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin tṛtīyā vidyā sarvāvidyopaśamāya saṃvartate,
T02bsu030_u:159: idaṃ ca me suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃghāya bhāṣitam -
T02bsu030_u:160: prajñā śreṣṭhā hi lokasya yeyaṃ nirvedhagāminī /
T02bsu030_u:166: udayāstaṃgamaprativedhaḥ? yatkiṃcitsamudayadharmi, tatsarvaṃ nirodhadharmi ityevaṃ samudayāstaṃgamaṃ pratividhyati /
T02bsu030_u:168: utpādasyaitadadhivacanam, astaṃgama iti nirodhasyaitadadhivacanam, na punaryathocyate tathodayāstaṃgamaḥ
T02bsu030_u:169: yaḥ kaścitsuvikrāntavikrāmin samudayaḥ, na sa udayadharmaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:174: samatānuyātamiti (Vaidya 6) suvikrāntavikrāmin nātra kaścidudayati na samudāgacchati /
T02bsu030_u:175: na tasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa svayaṃ
T02bsu030_u:179: yatrotpādo nāsti, na tatra nirodhaḥ, sa nirodhaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:180: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ samudayāstaṃgamaprativedhaḥ anutpādāya anirodhāya, so 'staṃgamaprativedhaḥ
T02bsu030_u:183: yaṃ pratītya yo dharma utpadyate, tameva pratītya sa dharmo na saṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:185: saiṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin pratītyasamutpādasya parijñā yathābhūtatā anutpādena sūcyate /
T02bsu030_u:189: yatra nāstyutpādaḥ, tatra kuto nirodhaḥ? anirodho nirodhaḥ pratītyasamutpādasyāvabodhaḥ
T02bsu030_u:192: yo 'nutpādaḥ, sa nātīto na anāgato na pratyutpannaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:196: yena ca anutpādo jñātaḥ, sa na bhūya
T02bsu030_u:200: yenotpādayati, tena niruddhā eva sarvadharmā jñātā dṛṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:210: na hi ajñānaṃ kṣayo vā akṣayo vā /
T02bsu030_u:218: yasya kasyavidvimukti, tenocyate kṣayajñānamiti, na punaryathocyate /
T02bsu030_u:219: yasya punaḥ kṣayajñānam, tasya na kaścidvyavahāraḥ /
T02bsu030_u:220: api tu nirdeśa eṣaḥ ajñānakṣaya iti vā kṣaya(jñāna)miti /
T02bsu030_u:221: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin akṣayakṣayajñānaparīkṣā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yenāvabuddhā sa
T02bsu030_u:225: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇadhātunirdeśaḥ, na punaryathā nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:226: anirdeśyo hi nirvāṇadhātuḥ sarvanirdeśasamatikrāntaḥ sarvanirdeśasamucchinno nirvāṇadhātuḥ
T02bsu030_u:227: ayamucyate lokottarāyā nirvedhikāyāḥ prajñāyā nirdeśaḥ, yo 'yaṃ nirvāṇadhāturiti /
T02bsu030_u:228: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇadhāturdeśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:232: tatra katamā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin
T02bsu030_u:234: sacetsuvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyā āraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhyeta, nirdiśettathāgataḥ prajñāyā āraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:237: api tu suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramiteti pārametatsarvadharmāṇāṃ jñānakarmaṇām, tenocyate
T02bsu030_u:239: na hi vācā na karmaṇā prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:243: / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi tatra kiṃcidanubuddham, na pratividdham /
T02bsu030_u:245: kathaṃ ca sarvadharmānubodhaḥ? nātra kācidbodhirnāpyatra kaści(danu)bodhaḥ
T02bsu030_u:246: / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhirupalabhyeta, labdhā syādbodhau bodhiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:247: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhau bodhiḥ saṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:251: na ca punardharmo dharmasvabhāvena saṃvidyate anenānubodhena /
T02bsu030_u:253: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmiṃstathāgatena bodhirupalabdhā, nāpi tathāgatena bodhirvijñaptā /
T02bsu030_u:255: na ca tathāgatena bodhirjñātā na janitā /
T02bsu030_u:257: na ca bodhiḥ kasyavidviṣayaḥ, na ca bodhau kaścitsattvo vā sattvaprajñaptirvā /
T02bsu030_u:258: yatra nasti sattvo vā sattvaprajñaptirvā, kathaṃ vaktavyo 'yaṃ
T02bsu030_u:259: bodhisattvaḥ, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramiteti? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhau bodhiḥ, na ca bodhau kaścitsattvaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:260: atikrāntā hyeṣā bodhiḥ, anutpannaiṣā bodhiḥ, anabhisaṃvṛttaiṣā bodhiḥ, alakṣaṇaiṣā bodhiḥ
T02bsu030_u:266: tatkamāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sattvasaṃjñāprabhāvitaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:268: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? avacanīyo hi bodhisattvaḥ, sattvasvabhāvavigato hi bodhisattvaḥ, sattvasaṃjñāvigatā hi bodhiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:274: yena ca anubuddhā pratibuddhā avikalpā kalpasamucchedāya, tenocyate bodhisattva iti, na punaryathocyate tatkasmāt? niḥsattvatvāt /
T02bsu030_u:275: yadi bodhisattvaḥ samupalabhyeta, labdhā syādbodhiḥ - iyaṃ sā bodhiḥ, asyāmayaṃ sattvā iti
T02bsu030_u:277: niḥsattvatayā sattvasaṃjñāvibhāvanatayā asattvasaṃjñāvibhāvanatayā bodhisattva ityucyate tat (Vaidya 8) kasmāt? sattvadhāturityasattvatāyā etadadhivacanam /
T02bsu030_u:278: na hi sattvaḥ sattve saṃvidyate, asaṃvidyamānatvātsattvadhātoḥ /
T02bsu030_u:279: yadi sattve sattvaḥ syāt, nocyeta sattvadhāturiti /
T02bsu030_u:283: atha sattvadhātunirmukto dhāturbhavet, adhātuko hi sattvadhātuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:285: na hi sattvadhātau dhātuḥ saṃvidyate, nāpyanyatra sattvadhātoḥ sattvadhātuḥ saṃvidyate
T02bsu030_u:287: idaṃ ca me saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - na sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu030_u:289: yathā ca sattvadhātornonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate, evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi nonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate /
T02bsu030_u:291: kācitpariniṣpattiḥ, yenaiṣāmūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā bhavet /
T02bsu030_u:292: ya evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmanubodhaḥ, sa ucyate sarvadharmānubodha iti /
T02bsu030_u:293: iyaṃ ca mayā saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - yathā sattvadhātornonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate,
T02bsu030_u:294: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi nonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyata iti /
T02bsu030_u:300: na hi buddhadharmāḥ kenacicchakyā ūnā vā pūrṇā vā kartum /
T02bsu030_u:303: sarvadharmānubodhaḥ, tatra na kasyaciddharmasya ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:305: na ca dharmadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:307: na hi sattvadhātośca dharmadhātośca nānātvamupalabhyate, nāpi sattvadhātorvā dharmadhātorvā ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vopalabhyate vā saṃvidyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:310: tenocyate - na buddhadharmāṇāmūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyata iti /
T02bsu030_u:312: na tatra śakyaṃ kenacidutkṣeptuṃ vā prakṣeptuṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:322: yo hi kaścit suvikrāntavikrāmin imān dharmānaprajānannanavabudhyamāno bodhisattva ityātmānaṃ pratijānīte, dūre tasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvabhūmiḥ, dūre
T02bsu030_u:324: / sacetpunaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin vāṅmātreṇa bodhisattvo bhavet, tena sarvasattvā api bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:327: na hi vākkarmaṇā bodhiḥ prāpyate, nāpi bodhisattvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:331: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi sattvā asattvamiti prajānanti /
T02bsu030_u:333: viparyastāḥ punaḥ sattvāḥ svacaryāṃ svaviṣayaṃ svagocaraṃ na prajānanti /
T02bsu030_u:335: prajānīyuḥ, na te bhūyaḥ kasmiṃścidvikalpe careyuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:338: teṣāmārambaṇacaritānāṃ vikalpacaritānāṃ kuto bodhiḥ, kuto bodhisattvadharmāḥ? ya evaṃ dharmaṃ prajānanti, na te bhūyo 'bhūtārambaṇe caranti /
T02bsu030_u:341: na bodhisattvāḥ kalpe na vikalpe caranti /
T02bsu030_u:342: yatra ca na kalpo na vikalpaḥ, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:347: sa evaṃ sarvadharmān prajānan na bhūya ārambaṇe vā vikalpe vā carati vicarati vā /
T02bsu030_u:353: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? jñātā hi tena bhūtāḥ sarvasattvāḥ,
T02bsu030_u:357: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye dharmāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ na saṃvidyante, tān dharmānabhisaṃskurvanti /
T02bsu030_u:360: saṃvidyate? ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā na kaściddharmo vidyate /
T02bsu030_u:361: sacetkaściddharmaḥ syāt - ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā, tena bhūtāḥ sattvā abhaviṣyan
T02bsu030_u:363: yaḥ ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā, tenocyate - abhūtāḥ sarvasattvā iti, avidyāsaṃskārasattvāḥ sarvasattvā iti /
T02bsu030_u:364: na hi kaścit suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvo nāma dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasya syādahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā /
T02bsu030_u:365: yasmācca na saṃvidyate, tasmādabhūtāḥ sattvā ityucyante /
T02bsu030_u:367: yathā vā punarabhūtāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñāyāmabhiniviṣṭāḥ, tasmāducyate abhūtāḥ sattvā
T02bsu030_u:369: abhūtamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin nātra kiṃcidbhūtaṃ na saṃbhūtam /
T02bsu030_u:375: ya evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmānavabudhyate, sa ucyate bodhisattva iti /
T02bsu030_u:378: kathaṃ jñātāḥ? abhūtā (Vaidya 10) asaṃbhūtā avitathāḥ, naite tathā yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ kalpitāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:382: akalpitā avikalpitā hi bodhiḥ, aviṭhapitā hi bodhiḥ, anupalambhā hi bodhiḥ
T02bsu030_u:387: yena suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhāya cittamutpādayanti - idaṃ cittaṃ bodhāyotpādayiṣyāma iti bodhiṃ manyante, astyasau bodhiryasyāṃ vayaṃ cittamutpādayiṣyāma iti, na te bodhisattvā ityucyante, utpannasattvāsta ucyante /
T02bsu030_u:389: ye bodhāya cittamutpādayanti, te bodhicittābhiniviṣṭā bodhisattvā ityucyante /
T02bsu030_u:396: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śakyaṃ bodhāya cittamutpādayitum /
T02bsu030_u:397: anutpannā hi bodhiḥ, acittā hi bodhiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:400: yā punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin utpādasamatā, sā bhūtatā /
T02bsu030_u:401: yā ca cittasamatā yā ca bhūtasamatā, yā ca bhūtasamatā yā ca samatā sā bodhiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:402: yatra ca yathābhūtatā, na tatra kaścidvikalpaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:403: te punarvikalpya cittaṃ bodhiṃ cābhiniviśya dvayato bodhāya cittamutpādayanti /
T02bsu030_u:404: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin anyaccittamanyā bodhiḥ, na ca citte bodhiḥ, nāpi bodhau cittam /
T02bsu030_u:405: yā ca bodhiryacca cittam, sā yathābhūtatā yathāvattā /
T02bsu030_u:412: katamā ca sā abhūtatā? sa sarvaloko hyabhūtaḥ,
T02bsu030_u:418: yenaivaṃ jñātaḥ, sa ucyate yathābhūtasattva iti /
T02bsu030_u:419: na bhūte bhūtamabhiniviśate, tenocyate yathābhūtasattva iti, na punaryathocyate /
T02bsu030_u:420: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi yathābhūte kaścitsattvo vā mahāsattvo vā /
T02bsu030_u:421: yo hi mahāyānamavagāhate, sa ucyate mahāsattva iti //
T02bsu030_u:424: yatkiṃcitsaṃskṛtaṃ jñānam, laukikaṃ jñānam, tena mahāsattva ityucyate /
T02bsu030_u:425: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? mahatī hi tasya sattvasaṃjñā vigatā, tenocyate mahāsattva iti /
T02bsu030_u:432: vigarhitā, na ca cittamupalabhante na ca caitasikān dharmān, cittaprakṛtiṃ ca prajānanti, na ca bodhimupalabhante, na ca bodhipakṣikān dharmān,
T02bsu030_u:433: bodhiprakṛtiṃ ca prajānanti, te nājñātacittena bodhiṃ ca paśyanti, na cānyatra bodheścittaṃ paśyanti, na bodhau cittaṃ paśyanti, na citte bodhiṃ
T02bsu030_u:435: ya evaṃ vibhāvayanti, na te ca bhāvayanti na vibhāvīkurvanti,
T02bsu030_u:436: te bhāvānapi nopalabhante na manyante nābhiniviśante, te hi bodhāya
T02bsu030_u:438: ye ca suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ bodhāya cittamutpādayanti, te bodhisattvā ityucyante, na ca te bodhervivartante /
T02bsu030_u:439: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? bodhāveva te sthitāḥ, ya evaṃ na bodheḥ, na cittasya, na
T02bsu030_u:441: na hyatra kaścitsamanupaśyati, na kaścidabhiniviśate, na kaścidvikalpamāpadyate /
T02bsu030_u:442: ya evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin adhimuktivimukticittamutpādayanti, te bhūtā bodhisattvā ityucyante
T02bsu030_u:444: bodhisaṃjñinaśca bodhāya cittamutpādayanti, dūre te bodheḥ, na te 'bhyāsannā bodheḥ /
T02bsu030_u:445: ye punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhernāpi dūre nābhyāsanne samanupaśyanti, te bodherāsannāḥ, taiśca bodhāya cittamutpāditam /
T02bsu030_u:446: etacca me saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - yo hi advayamātmānaṃ
T02bsu030_u:447: prajānāti, sa buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca prajānāti /
T02bsu030_u:448: tatkasya hetoḥ? ātmabhāvaṃ sa bhāvayati sarvadharmāṇām, yena advayaparijñayā sarvadharmāḥ parijñātāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:450: yo hi advayadharmaṃ prajānīte, sa buddhadharmān prajānīte /
T02bsu030_u:454: katamacca pāraṃ sarvadharmāṇām? yo hi naiva
T02bsu030_u:455: āramupalabhate na pāraṃ manyate na pāramabhiniviśate, tasya parijñayā pāragata ityucyate, na punaryathocyate /
T02bsu030_u:457: sā bodhisattvaprajñāpāramitā, yatra aṇvapi na kiṃcidgantavyaṃ vā adhigantavyaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:458: na hyatra āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu030_u:464: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - uttrasiṣyanti bhagavan asminnirdeśe adhimānikā nimittacāriṇa iti /
T02bsu030_u:465: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - agatiratrāyuṣman ānanda adhimānikānām,aviṣayaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:472: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? adhimānaprajñayā niradhimānatāṃ gaveṣante mānaprahāṇaṃ ca gaveṣante /
T02bsu030_u:473: ye punarāyuṣmānnānanda mānaṃ nopalabhante na samanupaśyanti na manyante nābhiniviśante, na te kvaciduttrasiṣyanti, nāpi kvaciduttrāsamāpsyante /
T02bsu030_u:474: na ca āyuṣmānnānanda adhimānikānāmarthāya iyaṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā /
T02bsu030_u:475: anavakāśo hyatra āyuṣmannānanda adhimānikānām, ye ca adhimānaprahāṇāyodyuktā vyāvacchante
T02bsu030_u:481: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda nāpi samamupalabhante na viṣamam, nāpi samaṃ manyante na viṣamam, evaṃ na samamabhiniviśante na viṣamam, na te kvaciduttrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante agatiratrāyuṣmannānanda sarvabālapṛthagjanānām, aviṣayaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:484: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānīyā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti, teṣāmapyatrāgatiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:489: ca kalyāṇamitropastabdhaṃ gambhīradharmādhimuktam, ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanulomaṃ caranti, ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇā**mavagāhante 'vataranti ca /
T02bsu030_u:490: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda bodhisattvā nimittāpagatā animittacāriṇo 'nānātvacāriṇo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvatyantameva niryātāḥ, ye naivaṃ cittamupalabhante na bodhim, na kasyaciddharmasya nānātvaṃ kurvanti, na
T02bsu030_u:491: samanupaśyanti, teṣāmeṣu evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu na dhandhāyitatvaṃ na
T02bsu030_u:495: te yato yato dharmān pṛcchyante, tatastata eva anulomaṃ
T02bsu030_u:498: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda yathāyaṃ śāradvatīputro nirdiśati /
T02bsu030_u:499: abhūmirānanda asyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmadhimānikānām, aviṣayo hi avatartumasyāṃ buddhabodhau
T02bsu030_u:501: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāmudāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhadharmeṣu cittaṃ krāmati /
T02bsu030_u:502: hīnādhimuktikā hi ānanda ābhi(dhi?)mānikāḥ pratilomamavasthitā buddhabodheḥ /
T02bsu030_u:505: śuddheyamānanda parṣat pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitā gambhīradharmādhimuktikā gambhīradharmacaritā /
T02bsu030_u:506: viśvasto hi ānanda tathāgato 'syāṃ parṣadi prasahya dharmaṃ deśayati, na ca kaṃcidanurakṣyaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T02bsu030_u:512: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda yadā anavatapto nāgarājaḥ pramudito bhavati prītisaumanasyajātaḥ, tadā svabhavane pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricārayati,
T02bsu030_u:514: tadā ye 'pi tasya putrā bhavanti, te 'pi pramuditāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanto
T02bsu030_u:515: mahāvṛṣṭimutsṛjanti, evameva ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjato ya ime jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, te
T02bsu030_u:516: 'pi iha lokadhātau svakasvakāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi gatvā imaṃ dharmasamudayamārabhya teṣāṃ
T02bsu030_u:518: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda sāgaro nāgarājo yadā pramudito bhavati, tadā svabhavane mahāvarṣadhārāḥ pramuñcati /
T02bsu030_u:519: ye ca tatra bhavane naivāsikā nāgā
T02bsu030_u:520: bhavanti, te tā varṣadhārāḥ saṃpratīcchanti, tuṣṭāśca bhavanti, tābhiśca te varṣadhārābhiḥ sukhaṃ ca saṃjānante /
T02bsu030_u:522: 'pi tā varṣadhārāḥ sahante, tābhiśca varṣadhārābhiḥ prāmodyaṃ
T02bsu030_u:524: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? asahyā hi ānanda tā varṣadhārā anyairnāgaiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:525: nāpyanye nāgāḥ sukhaṃ saṃjānīraṃstābhirvarṣadhārābhiḥ, na ca tuṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:527: ye ca tathāgatasya jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṛtakuśalamūlā udārāśayā gambhīradharmanayanirjātāḥ, te imāṃ mahādharmanayavṛṣṭiṃ
T02bsu030_u:528: tathāgatasya prasahante, śrutvā udagrāḥ prītāḥ praharṣitāḥ sukhaṃ saṃjānante /
T02bsu030_u:535: te khalu evaṃ saṃvibhaktāstasya rājñaścakravartino 'ntike bhūyasyā mātrayā adhikaṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca saṃjanayeyuḥ, samānārthatāṃ ca rājñaścakravartinaḥ ātmasu saṃjānīran /
T02bsu030_u:536: (Vaidya 14) evameva ānanda tathāgato 'pi dharmarājā dharmasvāmī svayaṃbhūrimān putrān saṃnipātya imaṃ dharmaratnagañjaṃ saṃvibhajati ebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ, na kaṃcidvañcayati, te mamāntike bhūyasyā
T02bsu030_u:537: mātrayā prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti, samānārthatāyāṃ ca buddhavaṃśasyānucchedāya tiṣṭhanti //
T02bsu030_u:538: na śakyamānanda anyaiḥ sattvairidaṃ dharmaratnaṃ hīnādhimuktikairadhimānikairdṛṣṭicaritairnimittacaritairupalambhadṛṣṭicaritairasmimānahatai rāgadveṣamohābhibhūtairutpathaprayātaiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:539: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cakravartidhanaṃ rocate /
T02bsu030_u:542: kimānanda daridrasattvānāṃ cakraratnena vā hastiratnena vā aśvaratnena vā maṇiratnena vā strīratnena vā gṛhapatiratnena vā pariṇāyakaratnena vā udārairvā vastraiḥ, udārairvā suvarṇamuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajataistaiḥ prayojanam, yāni labdhvāpi prītā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum /
T02bsu030_u:546: nāpyānanda daridrasattvā ratnānyapi prajānanti - asya ratnasyedaṃ nāmeti /
T02bsu030_u:547: evameva ānanda ye tathāgatasya putrā dṛṣṭasatyā bodhisattvāśca mahāsattvāḥ, te khalvasya dharmaratnakośasya pratyeṣakāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:550: kimānanda daridrasattvāḥ śrutavihīnāḥ śrutavipratipannā bālā acakṣuṣmantaḥ anena dharmaratnakośena kariṣyanti? labdhvā cojjhiṣyanti anyebhyo 'pi vā dātavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T02bsu030_u:551: na hi ānanda caṇḍālā vā pukkasā vā veṇukārā vā, ye vā kecidanye daridrajīvinaḥ sattvāḥ udāraṃ ratnaṃ labdhvā svayaṃ paribhuñjate /
T02bsu030_u:552: te samardhaṃ vā vikrīṇanti ujjhanti vā /
T02bsu030_u:553: daridrasattvā ityānanda sarvatīrthyakarāṇāmetadadhivacanam, ye cānyatīrthikāḥ śrāvakāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:554: daridrasattvā ityānanda sarvabālapṛthagjanānāmetadadhivacanaṃ dṛṣṭipaṅkanimagnānāmaupalambhikānāṃ bandhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ nimittacaritānāmutpathaprayātānām, ye khalu ānanda
T02bsu030_u:555: idaṃ dharmaratnaṃ labdhvā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum, ujjhanti vā, mudhā vā anyebhyaḥ prayacchanti
T02bsu030_u:556: ye punarānanda dharmaratnaṃ prāpnuvanti buddhaputrā buddhagocaracāriṇastathāgatavaṃśānucchedasthitāḥ, te khalvimaṃ (daṃ?) dharmaratnaṃ paribhuñjate /
T02bsu030_u:559: na hi ānanda śṛgālaḥ siṃhanādaṃ paribhuṅkte
T02bsu030_u:560: / ye punarānanda siṃhapotakā bhavanti mahāsiṃhenotpāditāḥ, te taṃ mahāsiṃhanādaṃ paribhuñjate
T02bsu030_u:562: te na samarthā tathāgatamahāsiṃhanādaṃ paribhoktum, mahāsiṃhasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmam
T02bsu030_u:563: ye punarānanda samyaksaṃbuddhasya potakāḥ mahābuddhasiṃhena svayaṃ bhuñjānenotpāditāḥ, te imaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamahāsiṃhanādaṃ
T02bsu030_u:566: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatpariśuddheyaṃ tathāgatasya parṣat saṃnipatitā /
T02bsu030_u:569: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - guṇāṃstvaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadaḥ
T02bsu030_u:571: āha - na hyasyā bhagavan parṣado mayā śakyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum /
T02bsu030_u:574: na hyasyāḥ parṣado guṇānāmantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantuṃ samyaksaṃbuddhairapi, prāgeva anyaiḥ satvaiḥ
T02bsu030_u:575: neyaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣattathāgatena saṃnipatitā, nāpyasyāṃ tathāgatasya kiṃcidautsukyamāsīdvā
T02bsu030_u:576: svenaiva kuśalamūlena iyaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā parṣat saṃnipatitā /
T02bsu030_u:580: avaśyaṃ hi evaṃrūpāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃnipāto bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:581: ye 'pyanye śāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ imaṃ sarvasaṃśayocchedanaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ
T02bsu030_u:589: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti suvikrāntavikrāmin katamā bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitā? yā pāramitā sarvadharmāṇām, na sā śakyā nirdeṣṭum /
T02bsu030_u:590: yathā punaryuṣmākamājānanā bhaviṣyati, tathā nirdekṣyāmi, yathā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavahārapadānyāgamiṣyanti
T02bsu030_u:593: evaṃ na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskārāḥ, na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:596: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? yaddhi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya pāram, na tadrūpam /
T02bsu030_u:598: evaṃ yadvedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, yadvijñānasya pāram, na tadvijñānam /
T02bsu030_u:599: yathā va rūpasya pāram, tathā rūpam /
T02bsu030_u:600: evaṃ yathā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, yathā ca vijñānasya pāram, tathā vijñānam /
T02bsu030_u:601: yathā ca vijñānasya pāram, tathā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāram /
T02bsu030_u:602: yacca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāram, na te sarvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:603: yathā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāram, tathā sarvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:604: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin "yadrūpasya pāraṃ na tadrūpam" iti rūpavisaṃyogo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ
T02bsu030_u:605: "yathā rūpasya pāraṃ tathā rūpam" iti rūpasvabhāvanirdeśo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:609: "yadvijñānasya pāraṃ na tadvijñānam" iti vijñānavisaṃyogo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:610: "yathā vijñānasya pāraṃ tathā vijñānam" iti vijñānasvabhāvanirdeśa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ, vijñānayathāvattā vijñānaprakṛtirvijñānānupalabdhireṣā nirdiṣṭā /
T02bsu030_u:611: "yacca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ na te sarvadharmāḥ" iti sarvadharmāṇāmeṣa visaṃyogo nirdiṣṭaḥ
T02bsu030_u:612: "yathā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ" iti sarvadharmasvabhāvanirdeśa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ, sarvadharmayathāvattā sarvadharmaprakṛtiḥ sarvadharmānupalabdhireṣā nirdiṣṭā /
T02bsu030_u:613: yathā ca sarvadharmayathāvattā sarvadharmaprakṛtiḥ sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ, tathā prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:614: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā rūpaniśritā, na vedanāniśritā, na
T02bsu030_u:616: nāpi prajñāpāramitā rūpasyādhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā viprakṛṣṭā sthitā /
T02bsu030_u:617: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:618: na vijñānasyādhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā viprakṛṣṭā sthitā //
T02bsu030_u:619: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasaṃyuktā prajñāpāramitā, nāpi rūpavisaṃyuktā /
T02bsu030_u:620: na vedanāsaṃyuktā na saṃskārasaṃyuktā, na vijñānasaṃyuktā prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:622: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā //
T02bsu030_u:623: yā punā rūpasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yathāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:624: evaṃ yā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā avitathathā ananyatathatā yathāvattathātā, sā prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:632: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi vijñāne vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:643: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya rūpaṃ gocaraḥ /
T02bsu030_u:644: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:646: agocara iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ saṃjānīte vā paśyati vā /
T02bsu030_u:647: yā ca rūpasya ajānanā apaśyanā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:648: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ (vijñānaṃ) saṃjānīte vā paśyati vā /
T02bsu030_u:649: yā ca vijñānasya ajānanā apaśyanā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:650: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvaṃ jahāti /
T02bsu030_u:655: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rūpaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:657: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ hīyate vā vardhate vā /
T02bsu030_u:659: na vijñānaṃ hīyate vā vardhate vā /
T02bsu030_u:661: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:663: na vijñānaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:665: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ viśuddhadharmi nāviśuddhadharmi /
T02bsu030_u:666: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:668: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na viśuddhadharmatā nāviśuddhadharmatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:669: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkrāmati vā avakrāmati vā /
T02bsu030_u:671: na vijñānaṃ saṃkrāmati vā avakrāmati vā /
T02bsu030_u:674: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:676: na vijñānaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:678: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ cyavate vā upapadyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:680: na vijñānaṃ cyavate vā upapadyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:682: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ jāyate vā mriyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:684: na vijñāna jāyate vā mriyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:686: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃsarati vā saṃsaraṇadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:687: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:688: na vijñānaṃ saṃsarati vā saṃsaraṇadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:691: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ kṣīyate vā kṣayadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:692: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:693: na vijñānaṃ kṣīyate vā kṣayadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:695: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ samudayadharmi na nirodhadharmi /
T02bsu030_u:699: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpamutpādadharmi vā vyayadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:703: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharmi na avipariṇāmadharmi /
T02bsu030_u:706: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na vipariṇāmadharmatā na avipariṇāmadharmatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:707: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:709: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:710: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na nityatā nāpyanityatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:711: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:713: na vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:714: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi sukhatā nāpyasukhatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:715: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpamātmā vā anātmā vā /
T02bsu030_u:718: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpyātmatā nāpyanātmatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:720: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:722: na vijñānaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:723: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na rāgadharmatā nāpi virāgadharmatā,
T02bsu030_u:725: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:727: na vijñānaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:728: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dveṣadharmatā nāpi
T02bsu030_u:730: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:732: na vijñānaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
T02bsu030_u:733: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na mohadharmatā nāpi
T02bsu030_u:735: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścitkartā vā kārayitā vā /
T02bsu030_u:737: na vijñānasya kaścitkartā vā kārayitā vā /
T02bsu030_u:739: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścidutthāpako vā samutthāpako vā /
T02bsu030_u:740: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:741: na vijñānasya kaścidutthāpako vā samutthāpako vā /
T02bsu030_u:742: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ notthāpanā va samutthāpanā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:743: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścijjñātā vā jñāpako vā /
T02bsu030_u:745: na vijñānasya kaścijjñātā vā jñāpako vā /
T02bsu030_u:747: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścidvedako vā vedayitā vā /
T02bsu030_u:749: na vijñānasya kaścidvedako vā vedayitā vā /
T02bsu030_u:751: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścijjānako vā paśyako vā /
T02bsu030_u:752: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:753: na vijñānasya kaścijjānako vā paśyako vā /
T02bsu030_u:756: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasyocchedatā vā śāśvatatā vā /
T02bsu030_u:757: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:760: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya anto vā ananto vā /
T02bsu030_u:761: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:763: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmantatā nāpyanantatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:764: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ na dṛṣṭigataprahāṇam /
T02bsu030_u:767: yacca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dṛṣṭigataṃ na dṛṣṭigataprahāṇam, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:769: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāprahāṇam /
T02bsu030_u:770: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:772: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāprahāṇatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:773: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:775: na vijñānaṃ kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:776: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na kuśalatā nākuśalatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:777: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya gamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu030_u:778: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:779: na vijñānasya gamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T02bsu030_u:780: yatra ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na gatirnāgatiḥ prajñāyate, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:781: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ sthitirvā asthitirvā /
T02bsu030_u:784: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:785: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpyāratā na pāratā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:786: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni śīlaṃ vā dauḥśīlyaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:789: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni anunayo vā pratigho vā /
T02bsu030_u:792: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni dadati vā pratigṛhṇāti vā /
T02bsu030_u:795: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kṣāntirvā akṣāntirvā /
T02bsu030_u:798: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni vīryaṃ vā kausīdyaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:801: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ samādhirna vikṣiptacittatā /
T02bsu030_u:802: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na samādhirna vikṣiptacittatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:803: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni prajñā vā dauṣprajñyaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:804: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi prajñatā nāpi dauṣprajñatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:805: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāni viparyāsā vā aviparyāsā vā /
T02bsu030_u:806: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi viparyāsatā nāpyaviparyāsatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:808: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni smṛtyupasthānāni vā asmṛtyupasthānāni vā /
T02bsu030_u:809: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi smṛtirnāpyasmṛtiḥ, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:810: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni samyakprahāṇāni vā asamyakprahāṇāni vā /
T02bsu030_u:811: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi samyakprahāṇatā nāpyasamyakprahāṇatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:812: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni ṛddhipādā vā apramāṇāni vā /
T02bsu030_u:813: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi ṛddhipādatā nāpyapramāṇatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:814: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni indriyāṇi vā balabodhyaṅgamārgaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:815: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nendriyatā na balabodhyaṅgamārgatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:816: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni vidyā vā vimuktirvā /
T02bsu030_u:817: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na vidyatā na
T02bsu030_u:819: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñā vā nāpyanabhijñā vā /
T02bsu030_u:820: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattitā nāpyabhijñatā nāpyanabhijñatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:821: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni śūnyatā vā animittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:822: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na śūnyatā nānimittatā nāpraṇihitatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:823: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃskṛtāni vā asaṃskṛtāni vā /
T02bsu030_u:824: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṃskṛtatā nāpyasaṃskṛtatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:825: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṅgo vā asaṅgo vā /
T02bsu030_u:826: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṅgatā nāpyasaṅgatā,
T02bsu030_u:828: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni jñānaṃ vā ajñānaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:829: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi jñānatā nāpyajñānatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:830: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni manyanā vā spandanā vā prapañcanā vā /
T02bsu030_u:831: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmanyanatā aspandanatā aprapañcatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:833: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā
T02bsu030_u:834: / yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṃjñatā nāpyasaṃjñatā,
T02bsu030_u:836: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni upaśāntāni vā anupaśāntāni vā /
T02bsu030_u:839: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nirvṛttirna anirvṛttiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:842: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:843: yā punaḥ pañcaskandhānāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:846: yā punardhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:849: yā punarviparyāsanīvaraṇābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:852: yā punaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśattṛṣṇācaritābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:853: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yo dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattinirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:854: yā punardhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattinirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:855: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ nirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:856: yā punaḥ pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:857: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ saṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:858: yā punasteṣāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
T02bsu030_u:863: yā punaḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:865: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaścaturāryasatyanirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:866: yā punaścaturāryasatyanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:869: yā punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaviśuddhinirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:872: yā punarasaṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ lokottarāṇāmaniśritānāmanāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:873: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādānabhisaṃskṛtadharmasya nirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:874: yā punaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādānabhisaṃskṛtadharmanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:875: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yo vidyāvimuktivirāganirodhanirvāṇanirdeśaḥ, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:876: yā punarvidyāvimuktivirāganirodhanirvāṇanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:877: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaparyāpannā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:878: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:881: na kāmadhātu - na rūpadhātu - nārūpadhātuparyāpannā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:887: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kasmiṃściddharme paryāpannā nāpyaparyāpannā /
T02bsu030_u:888: yā ca paryāpannāparyāpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā //
T02bsu030_u:889: tathateti suvikrāntavikrāmin kasyaitadadhivacanam? na hyete suvikrāntavikrāmin tathā dharmā yathā bālapṛthagjanairupalabdhāḥ, na cānyathā /
T02bsu030_u:890: yathā dharmāstathāgataistathāgataśrāvakairbodhisattvaiśca dṛṣṭāḥ, tathaiva te sarvadharmāḥ, tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā
T02bsu030_u:893: na khalu punariyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya hānāya vā vivṛddhaye vā pratyupasthitā, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya
T02bsu030_u:894: vā visaṃyogāya vā, ūnatvāya vā pūrṇatvāya vā, apacayāya vā upacayāya vā,
T02bsu030_u:895: saṃkrāntaye vā avakrāntaye vā, utpādāya vā (Vaidya 24) nirodhāya vā,
T02bsu030_u:896: saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā, pravṛttaye vā nivṛttaye vā, samudayāya vā astaṃgamāya vā, salakṣaṇāya vā alakṣaṇāya vā, samatāyai vā visamatāyai vā,
T02bsu030_u:897: saṃvṛtyai vā paramārthāya vā, sukhāya vā duḥkhāya vā, nityatāyai vā anityatāyai vā, śubhatāyai vā aśubhatāyai vā, ātmatāyai vā anātmatāyai vā,
T02bsu030_u:898: satyatāyai vā mṛṣatāyai vā, kartṛtvena vā akartṛtvena vā, kāraṇatvena vā akāraṇatvena vā, saṃbhavāya vā asaṃbhavāya vā, svabhāvatāyai vā asvabhāvatāyai vā, cyutaye vā upapattaye vā, jāyate vā ajāyate vā,
T02bsu030_u:899: abhinirvṛttaye vā anabhinirvṛtaye vā, upapattaye vā upapattisamucchedāya
T02bsu030_u:900: vā, sāmagryai vā visāmagryai vā, sarāgāya vā virāgāya vā, sadoṣāya vā vigatadoṣāya vā, samohāya vā vigatamohāya vā, viparyāsāya vā aviparyāsāya
T02bsu030_u:901: vā, ārambaṇāya vā anārambaṇāya vā, kṣayāya vā akṣayāya vā, jñānāya vā ajñānāya vā, nīcatvāya vā uccatvāya vā, upakārāya vā nirūpakārāya vā,
T02bsu030_u:902: gamanāya vā āgamanāya vā, astitvāya vā nāstitvāya vā, anunayāya vā pratighāya vā, ālokāya vā andhakārāya vā, kausīdyāya vā vīryārambhāya vā,
T02bsu030_u:903: śūnyatāyai vā aśūnyatāyai vā, nimittatāyai vā animittatāyai vā,
T02bsu030_u:904: praṇidhānāya vā apraṇidhānāya vā, abhisaṃskārāya vā anabhisaṃskārāya vā,
T02bsu030_u:905: antardhānāya vā anantardhānāya vā, vidyāyai vā vimuktaye vā, śāntatāyai vā anupaśāntatāyai vā, nirvṛttaye vā anabhinirvṛttaye vā, yoniśāya vā ayoniśāya vā, parijñāyai vā aparijñāyai vā, niryāṇāya vā aniryāṇāya vā,
T02bsu030_u:906: vinayāya vā avinayāya vā, śīlāya vā dauḥśīlyāya vā, vikṣiptatāyai vā avikṣiptatāyai vā, prajñatāyai vā duṣprajñatāyai vā, vijñānāya vā avijñānāya vā, sthitaye vā asthitaye vā, sabhāgatāyai vā visabhāgatāyai
T02bsu030_u:907: vā, bhavāya vā vibhavāya vā, prāptaye vā aprāptaye vā, abhisamayāya vā anabhisamayāya vā, sākṣātkriyāyai vā asākṣātkriyāyai vā, prativedhāya vā aprativedhāya vā pratyupasthitā iti (prajñāpāramitāyāṃ) tathatāparivarto nāma tṛtīyaḥ //
T02bsu030_u:911: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapnadarśī puruṣaḥ svapnasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati, na ca svapnasvabhāvanirdeśaḥ
T02bsu030_u:913: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? svapna eva na saṃvidyate, kutaḥ punaḥ svapnasvabhāvanirdeśo bhaviṣyati? evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaśca nirdiśyate, na ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
T02bsu030_u:915: tadyathāpiu nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapno na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitaḥ
T02bsu030_u:916: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
T02bsu030_u:917: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyādarśī puruṣo māyāsvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati, na ca māyāyāḥ svabhāvanirdeśaḥ kaścitsaṃvidyate, kutaḥ punarmāyāsvabhāvanirdeśasya svabhāvo bhaviṣyati? evameva prajñāpāramitā ca
T02bsu030_u:918: nirdiśyate, na ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvanirdeśaḥ kaścitsaṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:919: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā, evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā //
T02bsu030_u:920: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratibhāsadarśī puruṣaḥ pratibhāsasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati, na ca kaścitpratibhāsasvabhāvaḥ
T02bsu030_u:921: saṃvidyate, kutaḥ punaḥ pratibhāsasvabhāvanirdeśo bhaviṣyati? evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā ca nirdiśyate, na ca kaścitprajñāpāramitāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate, kutaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvanirdeśo bhaviṣyati? tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratibhāso na kasyaciddharmasya nirdaśanena pratyupasthitaḥ, evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcidarśī puruṣo marīcidarśanaṃ ca
T02bsu030_u:922: nirdiśati, na ca marīcidarśana (svabhāvaḥ kaścit) saṃvidyate, kutaḥ punarmarīcidarśanasvabhāvo bhaviṣyati? evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā na nirdiśyate, na ca punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvanirdeśaḥ kaścitsaṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:923: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcirna kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā, evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
T02bsu030_u:924: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratiśrutkāgocarasthaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiśrutkāyāśca śabdaṃ śṛṇoti, na ca taṃ samanupaśyati /
T02bsu030_u:925: yadā punaḥ svayamevānubhāṣate, tadā taṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti /
T02bsu030_u:926: evameva prajñāpāramitānirdeśapadaṃ cādhigacchati śravaṇāya, na ca kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśaśravaṇāya gacchati anyatra yadābhibhāṣyate tadā
T02bsu030_u:929: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin phenapiṇḍadarśī puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati, na ca phenapiṇḍasvabhāva upalabhyate adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā, kutaḥ
T02bsu030_u:930: punastannirdeśasvabhāvopalabdhirbhaviṣyati? evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā ca nirdiśyate, na ca prajñāpāramitāsvabhāva upalabhyate /
T02bsu030_u:931: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin phenapiṇḍo na kasyaciddharmasya
T02bsu030_u:932: abhinirvṛttisvabhāvamupaiti, evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttasvabhāvamupaiti
T02bsu030_u:933: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudadarśī puruṣo budbudasvabhāvaṃ ca
T02bsu030_u:934: nirdiśati, na ca budbudasvabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate, kutaḥ punarbudbudasvabhāvanirdeśo bhaviṣyati? evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā ca nirdiśyate, na ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:935: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudo na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitaḥ, evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitā tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣaḥ kadalyāḥ sāraṃ paryeṣamāṇo
T02bsu030_u:936: nopalabhate, atha ca tasyāḥ patraiḥ kāryaṃ karoti, evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāraṃ na saṃvidyate, prajñāpāramitāyā nirdeśaḥ kāryaṃ ca karoti //
T02bsu030_u:937: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣa ākāśanidarśanena vyavahārati, na cākāśasya kiṃcinnidarśanam saṃvidyate /
T02bsu030_u:938: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramiteti vyavahāraḥ kriyate, na ca kasyacinnidarśanena
T02bsu030_u:940: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin nākāśaṃ na vyavahriyate,
T02bsu030_u:941: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate /
T02bsu030_u:942: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā ca vyavahriyate, na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate //
T02bsu030_u:943: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin chāyeti cātapaśceti vyavahriyate, na ca tau kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitau, avabhāsaśca vijñāyate /
T02bsu030_u:945: gacchati, na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vyavahārapadamāgacchati,
T02bsu030_u:947: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin maṇiratnamuttaptaṃ mahatāvabhāsena pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati, na ca so 'vabhāso 'dhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā
T02bsu030_u:950: pratyupasthitā, na ca so 'vabhāso 'adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti
T02bsu030_u:951: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin tailapradyotasya dhmāyato nāsyārciṣo muhūrtamapi saṃtiṣṭhante, avabhāsaṃ ca kurvanti, tenāvabhāsena rūpāṇi darśanamāgacchanti /
T02bsu030_u:952: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin (Vaidya 27) prajñāpāramitā na kasmiṃściddharme 'vatiṣṭhate, dharmāṇāṃ cāvabhāsaṃ karoti, tena cāvabhāsena sarvadharmā yathābhūtadarśanamāgacchantyāryāṇām //
T02bsu030_u:953: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca nirdiṣṭā, prajñāpāramitāyāśca apariniṣpattirnirdiṣṭā /
T02bsu030_u:994: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra indrāyudhaṃ nānāraṅgavicitraṃ ca saṃdṛśyate, na cāsya kācidraṅganiṣpattiḥ
T02bsu030_u:995: nopalabhyate, evameva prajñāpāramitā nānānidarśanaiśca pratyupasthitā, na cāsyā nidarśanasvabhāva upalabhyate /
T02bsu030_u:996: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśe na jātu kenacitpañcāṅgulipariniṣpattirdṛṣṭapūrvā, śāradvatīputra na jātu
T02bsu030_u:998: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - durdṛśeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā
T02bsu030_u:999: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddarśanamupaiti /
T02bsu030_u:1002: tathā hi śāradvatīputra nāsyāṃ kaścidupalabhyate yo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1036: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra bhagavantametadavocat - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitā na nirodhāya /
T02bsu030_u:1037: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya utpādāya vā pariniṣpattaye vā nirodhāya vā ātmatāyai vā
T02bsu030_u:1041: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra nirārambaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1042: tathā hi ta eva dharmā na
T02bsu030_u:1045: kasyaciddharmasya hānaye vā vṛddhaye vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1046: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā (Vaidya 29) na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
T02bsu030_u:1047: yo dharmo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
T02bsu030_u:1050: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yaṃ samatikrāmet āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya apacayāya vā
T02bsu030_u:1052: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasya apacayo vā upacayo vā bhavet /
T02bsu030_u:1054: neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1055: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yaṃ dharmaṃ saṃyojayedvā visaṃyojayedvā /
T02bsu030_u:1057: neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya naye vā vinaye vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1058: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmo netavyo vā vinetavyo vā /
T02bsu030_u:1059: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya upakārāya vā apakārāya vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1060: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasya upakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā kuryāt /
T02bsu030_u:1062: neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃbhavāya vā asaṃbhavāya vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1063: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ saṃbhavedvā na saṃbhavedvā /
T02bsu030_u:1065: neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃprayogāya vā viprayogāya vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1067: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ saṃprayujyate vā viprayujyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:1068: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsāya vā asaṃvāsāya vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1070: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ saṃvasedvā na saṃvasedvā /
T02bsu030_u:1071: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pravṛttaye vā apravṛtaye vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1073: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasya dharmasya pravṛttirvā
T02bsu030_u:1076: kasyaciddharmasya kriyayā vā karaṇena vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1077: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasya dharmasya kriyā vā karaṇaṃ vā bhavet /
T02bsu030_u:1079: kasyaciddharmasya samatayā vā viṣamatayā vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1080: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ samo vā viṣamo vā syāt /
T02bsu030_u:1082: kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā asaṃgrahāya vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1084: tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ saṃgrahītavyo vā utsraṣṭavyo vā syāt /
T02bsu030_u:1085: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kenacitkāryeṇa pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1086: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ kāryakaraḥ syāt //
T02bsu030_u:1107: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra samudro gambhīro vipulo 'prameyaḥ, evameva prajñāpāramitā gambhīrā vipulā aprameyā /
T02bsu030_u:1108: gambhīreti śāradvatīputra aprameyadharmaratnasaṃcayabhūtā, yasyā gādho na labhyate /
T02bsu030_u:1111: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra samudro mahāsāgaraḥ sarvaratnasaṃnicayo 'prameyaratnabharito
T02bsu030_u:1115: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena
T02bsu030_u:1117: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1118: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
T02bsu030_u:1119: yasya dharmasya jñānaṃ vā ajñānaṃ vā syāt /
T02bsu030_u:1120: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ārakṣāyai vā guptyai vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1121: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
T02bsu030_u:1122: yasya dharmasya ārakṣāṃ vā guptiṃ vā kuryāt /
T02bsu030_u:1123: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā parigrahāya vā
T02bsu030_u:1125: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasya dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vā parigrahaṃ vā kuryāt
T02bsu030_u:1126: / āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya niśrayeṇa vā
T02bsu030_u:1129: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati, yasya dharmasya niśrayaṃ vā aniśrayaṃ vā kuryāt
T02bsu030_u:1131: kasyaciddharmasya ālayena vā vilayena vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1132: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasmin ālayaṃ
T02bsu030_u:1134: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya abhiniveśena pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1135: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasminnabhiniveśaṃ (Vaidya 31) kuryāt /
T02bsu030_u:1137: neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya adhyavasānena pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1138: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, na samanupaśyati, yasminnadhyavasānaṃ kuryāt /
T02bsu030_u:1139: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsena vā
T02bsu030_u:1142: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yena dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ vaset /
T02bsu030_u:1143: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdhinā vā
T02bsu030_u:1146: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmaḥ saṃdhātavyo vā visaṃdhātavyo vā /
T02bsu030_u:1147: āha - neya bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya rāgeṇa vā virāgeṇa vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1149: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yasmin dharme rajyeta vā virajyeta vā /
T02bsu030_u:1150: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya dveṣeṇa vā adveṣeṇa vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1152: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharma sadveṣo vā vigatadveṣo vā bhavet /
T02bsu030_u:1154: kasyaciddharmasya mohena vā vigatamohena vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1155: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate, yo dharmo mūḍho vā syādvigatamoho vā /
T02bsu030_u:1157: kasyaciddharmasya jñāpayitrī vā ajñāpayitrī vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1159: tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate na
T02bsu030_u:1160: samanupaśyati, yaṃ dharmaṃ jānīyāt yasya vā dharmasya jñāpayitrī vā bhavet
T02bsu030_u:1161: / āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtyā vā
T02bsu030_u:1163: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtiṃ vā samanupaśyati
T02bsu030_u:1164: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya śuddhyā vā viśuddhyā vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1165: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ
T02bsu030_u:1202: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat
T02bsu030_u:1207: tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya rūpapariniṣpattyā vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1209: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati yasmin pratihanyeta
T02bsu030_u:1215: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasaret /
T02bsu030_u:1219: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa prajñapyeta /
T02bsu030_u:1223: prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa sādhāraṇā bhavet
T02bsu030_u:1237: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1252: na hyasyāḥ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate, nāpi kenacidupalabdhāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1254: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśasyānto nopalabhyate, evameva prajñāpāramitāyā anto nopalabhyate
T02bsu030_u:1256: abdhātvanantatayā tejodhātvanantatayā vāyudhātvanantatayā vijñānadhātvanantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā /
T02bsu030_u:1258: na hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā deśasthā na pradeśasthā /
T02bsu030_u:1262: avidyāparyantatayā saṃskārāparyantatayā vijñānāparyantatayā nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanāparyantatayā yāvat jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
T02bsu030_u:1267: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā /
T02bsu030_u:1273: pṛthagjanadharmāparyantatayā śrāvakadharmāparyantatayā pratyekabuddhadharmāparyantatayā buddhadharmāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
T02bsu030_u:1274: vidyāparyantatayā vimuktyaparyantatayā vimuktijñā[nadarśa]nāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
T02bsu030_u:1279: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśānāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaḥ? bhagavānāha - ye te śāradvatīputra
T02bsu030_u:1280: bodhisattvā dharmamapi nopalabhante prāgevādharmam, mārgamapi nopalabhante prāgevāmārgam, śīlamapi nopalabhante na manyante prāgeva dauḥśīlyam,
T02bsu030_u:1282: sarvabhavagaticyutyupapattiṣu, anadhyavasitāśca kāye jīvite ca prāgeva bāhyeṣu vastuṣu, kṛtaparyantāśca saṃsārasrotasaḥ, uttīrṇāśca
T02bsu030_u:1283: mahābhavārṇavāt, samuttīrṇāśca mahāsaṃgrāmāt, teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaśca gatiśca, sarvaviṣayā aviṣayā iti ca yeṣāṃ parijānante (parijñānam?), te tathārūpāḥ satpuruṣāḥ
T02bsu030_u:1289: yeṣāṃ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo gatiśca /
T02bsu030_u:1290: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra asyāṃ parṣadi samanupaśyāmi ekamapi bodhisattvam, yasya naiṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo vā adhimuktirvā, yo vā eṣu dharmeṣu sākāṅkṣo vā
T02bsu030_u:1292: niṣkāṅkṣeyaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadeṣu dharmeṣu nirvicikitsā nirvaimatikā /
T02bsu030_u:1293: nāsti śāradvatīputra eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu vimatiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1294: vimatisamuddhātāya śāradvatīputra ete satpuruṣāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sthitāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1295: niḥsaṃśayā hyete śāradvatīputra eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃśayasamatikrāntāḥ //
T02bsu030_u:1296: ye 'pi te śāradvatīputra paścime kāle paścime samaye imāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śroṣyanti, te 'pi niḥsaṃśayā bhaviṣyanti sarvadharmeṣu, sarvasattvānāṃ ca saṃśayacchedanāya pratipannā bhaviṣyanti, niḥsaṃśayāśca te dharmaṃ
T02bsu030_u:1298: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra parīttakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktiṃ vadāmi /
T02bsu030_u:1299: nāpi teṣāmeṣu dharmeṣvavakāśaḥ, nāpi teṣāmidaṃ dhanam /
T02bsu030_u:1300: nāpi te śāradvatīputra sattvāḥ parīttakuśalamūlasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti, yeṣāmiyaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati kimaṅga punarye udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti niyatāste buddhadharmeṣu, vyākṛtāste buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1301: evaṃ ca te siṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyanti yathāhametarhi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi astambhitanādaṃ mahāpuruṣanādaṃ svayaṃbhūnādam /
T02bsu030_u:1302: ye eṣu dharmeṣvatyantaśaḥ śraddhāṃ janayitvā chandaṃ janayiṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, (Vaidya 35)
T02bsu030_u:1304: tatkamāddhetoḥ? durlabhā hi śāradvatīputra te sattvāḥ, ya imān gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā prītiṃ ca
T02bsu030_u:1305: vindanti, prāmodyaṃ ca janayanti, adhimuñcante ca /
T02bsu030_u:1306: ataḥ śāradvatīputra durlabhatamāste sattvāḥ, ye gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti, chandaṃ ca janayanti
T02bsu030_u:1308: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra tān sattvān mahāsaṃsārasaṃprasthitāniti vadāmi yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ śravaṇapathamapyāgamiṣyati, śrutvā ca (ye) paṭhiṣyanti adhimokṣyanti udāraṃ ca prītisaumanasyaṃ janayiṣyanti, eṣu dharmeṣu chandaṃ janayiṣyanti punaḥ punaḥ śravaṇāyāpi, kaḥ punarvādaḥ uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyātuṃ vā parebhyo deśayituṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:1309: vyākaromyahaṃ śāradvatīputra anavakrāntaniyāmān aniyatān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhauḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1310: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra hīnadharmasamanvāgatānāṃ sattvānāmagrato dharmeṣvavakāśaṃ samanupaśyāmi
T02bsu030_u:1312: yadbhūyasā ca sattvā hīnādhimuktikā hīnadharmasamanvāgatā akṛtakalyāṇāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1314: ye punaste śāradvatīputra udārāḥ sattvā udāradharmādhimuktā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ supariprāptakāryāḥ susaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ suvicitrārthā mahāmārgeṇa saṃprasthitā aviṣameṇa ṛjunā, agahanena samena apagatakhāṇukaṇṭakena apagataśvabhraprapātena śucinā apagatakilbiṣeṇa akuṭilena avaṅkena, ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1315: lokasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya va devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, avabhāsakarāstīrthabhūtāḥ sattvānām,
T02bsu030_u:1317: sarvasattvānāṃ sukhopadhānāya pratyupasthitāḥ, teṣāṃ śāradvatīputra tathārūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmidaṃ mahādhanam /
T02bsu030_u:1318: ta eva ca śāradvatīputra mahāsattvā asya dharmaratnasya pratyeṣakāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1322: etacca me śāradvatīputra saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanti
T02bsu030_u:1324: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃgocarā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - anantaviṣayagocarā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1327: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra vāyudhāturākāśadhātuviṣayagocaraḥ, evameva prajñāpāramitā ākāśadhātuviṣayagocarā
T02bsu030_u:1328: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kvacitsaṃdṛśyete, na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttilakṣaṇena pratyupasthitau, evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kvaciddharme saṃdṛśyate, na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttilakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1329: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca agrāhyāpariniṣpattito na varṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchataḥ, evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā agrāhyāniṣpattito na (Vaidya 36) kenacidvarṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchati vā upaiti vā /
T02bsu030_u:1330: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattidarśanenopayātau, evameva prajñāpāramitā na
T02bsu030_u:1332: āha - kiṃlakṣaṇeya bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - alakṣaṇeyaṃ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramtiā
T02bsu030_u:1333: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhātuśca vāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya
T02bsu030_u:1334: pariciṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ, evameva śāradavtīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopaiti /
T02bsu030_u:1335: āha - kiṃlakṣaṇeyaṃ bahgavan prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - alakṣaṇā hi śāradvatīputra
T02bsu030_u:1337: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātudhca na kasyaciddharmasya
T02bsu030_u:1342: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturna kvacitsajjati, evameva prajñāpārmaitā na kvacitsajjati, te nocyate asaṅgalakṣaṇeti /
T02bsu030_u:1347: na ca asaṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na nimittam /
T02bsu030_u:1350: na hi śāradvatīputra saṅge saṅgo cidyate, tenocyate saṅgayathā bhūtatā
T02bsu030_u:1357: yatra ca lakṣaṇaṃ na saṃvidyate, taducyate alakṣaṇamiti /
T02bsu030_u:1364: yo gi śāradavtīputra dharmo 'saṅgalakṣaṇaḥ, sa na kenacinnidarśaena
T02bsu030_u:1365: pratyupasthitaḥ, na saṅgadarśanena, api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāmetadasaṅgalakṣaṇanidarśanaṃ kṛtam /
T02bsu030_u:1372: yadapi śāradvatīputra vyavadānam, tasyāpi nāsti lakṣaṇam
T02bsu030_u:1373: / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? saṃkleśa eva ca tāvaccāradvatīpiutra alakṣaṇaḥ, prāgrva vyavdānam /
T02bsu030_u:1374: yā śāradvatīputra saṃkleśasya parijñā, sā yathābhūtā /
T02bsu030_u:1395: n ahi śāradvtīputra gocaranidarśanalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate /
T02bsu030_u:1396: viṣaya iti śāradvatīputra aviṣaya e ṣa dharmāṇām eṣā yathābhūtatā, yathāvattā /
T02bsu030_u:1398: yaivaṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā, ayamucyate viṣaygocara iti, na punaryathocyate /
T02bsu030_u:1399: ya evaṃ sarvadahrmaparijñayā na kvacitsaṅgaḥ, idamucyate asaṅgalakṣaṇamiti /
T02bsu030_u:1401: eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu na bahavaḥ sahāyakāḥ pratilabhyante
T02bsu030_u:1402: / tathāgatajñānaviṣayanirdeśa eṣaḥ, yaivaṃ dharmāṇāṃ sūcanā saṃprakāśanā vibhājanā /
T02bsu030_u:1403: na hyeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu kaścidanyaḥ sahāyaḥ, anyatra dṛṣṭasatyaiḥ śrāvakairavinivartanīyairvā
T02bsu030_u:1405: teṣāmapi tāvacchāradvatīputra dṛṣṭisaṃpannānāmeṣu dharmeṣu caritānāṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt /
T02bsu030_u:1406: niḥsaṃśayaḥ śāradvatīputra kāyasākṣī ca bodhisattvaśca pratilabdhakṣāntikaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1408: nāyaṃ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati /
T02bsu030_u:1411: avaropitakuśalamūlāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti kalyāṇāśayāḥ, kṛtādhikārā buddheṣu bhagavatsu bodhāyāvaropitabuddhabījā buddhayānasamārūḍhā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāsannasthāyino yoniśaḥ praśnapṛcchakāḥ, yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati /
T02bsu030_u:1413: kṣāntipratilabdhā vā bhaviṣyanti, yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastaṃ
T02bsu030_u:1415: ye ca vyākṛtāḥ, te kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante sthāpayitvā praṇidhānavaśāt
T02bsu030_u:1416: ye na vyākṛtāḥ, te kṣipraṃ saṃmukhaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyante, atha ca śāradvatīputra vyākṛtā eva te mantavyāḥ saṃmukhavyākaraṇena /
T02bsu030_u:1417: na hi śāradvatīputra aparipakvakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ sūtrāntaḥ
T02bsu030_u:1418: śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati, kimaṅga punaryadetaṃ sūtrāntaṃ pratilabheran vā lekhayeyurvā ārādhayeyurvā uddiśeyurvā dhyāyeran vā, parebhyo vā vistareṇa
T02bsu030_u:1420: paripakvakuśalamūlāste śāradvatīputra sattvāḥ, ya imaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
T02bsu030_u:1423: api tu khalu punaḥ śāradvatīputra ārocayāmi te, prativedayāmi te /
T02bsu030_u:1424: na tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānīyena vā śrāvakayānīyena vā imān dharmān pratilabhya alpotsukena bhavitavyam, kusīdena vā middhabahulena vā asaṃprajñena vā anupasthitasmṛtinā vā vikṣiptacittena vā āmiṣagṛddhena vā lolena vā mukhareṇa vā tundena vā pragalbhena vā prākṛtendriyeṇa vā /
T02bsu030_u:1425: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni na visaṃvādayanti /
T02bsu030_u:1426: api tu khalu imān dharmān labdhvā bodhisattvena bhūyasyā mātrayā apramādaśca vīryaṃ ca utsāhaśca chandaśca akausīdyaṃ ca saṃvṛtendriyatā ca amukharatā cāsevitavyā, smṛtyupasthāneṣu bāhuśrutyeṣu ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1429: yadbodhisattvo vā śrāvakayāniko vā evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā
T02bsu030_u:1430: pramādamāpadyeta, viśvāsaṃ vā gacchet, chandaṃ vā parihīyeta, vīryaṃ vā hāpayet, śaithilyaṃ vopadarśayet, vyāpādabahulo vā bhavet /
T02bsu030_u:1432: bhavet, nāpi tena ime evaṃrūpā dharmāḥ śrutā bhaveyuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1434: na hi śāradvatīputra vipratipannena ayaṃ dharmaḥ śruto bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:1437: pratipattireṣā śāradvatīputra asmin dharme ucyate, yo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu dharmeṣu
T02bsu030_u:1439: kṣāntisaṃpannasya śāradvatīputra pudgalasya pratipattisthitasya na bhūyo 'pāyagamanaṃ bhavati, kṣipraṃ caiṣu dharmeṣu
T02bsu030_u:1442: anikṣiptadhureṇāpi viśvāso na kartavyaḥ, yāvadeṣu dharmeṣu pariniṣpatsyata
T02bsu030_u:1444: yaḥ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu pariniṣpannaḥ śikṣito labdhakṣāntirna bhūyasā apāyagamanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kuryāt /
T02bsu030_u:1445: na cāsya bhūyaḥ kausīdyaṃ vā hīnabhāgīyaṃ vā bhavet /
T02bsu030_u:1449: parijñāto hi śāradvatīputra tena bhavati saṃkleśaśca vyavadānaṃ ca, dṛṣṭaṃ ca tena yathābhūtaṃ bhavati - sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitā abhūtā iti /
T02bsu030_u:1450: sa evaṃ samyagdarśī kṣāntisaṃpanno bhavati sūrato 'mandavān (?)
T02bsu030_u:1452: devā api śāradvatīputra tathārūpebhyaḥ spṛhayanti prāgeva manuṣyāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1453: devānāmapi te tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ spṛhaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:1454: devānāmapi te satkārārhā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām /
T02bsu030_u:1455: devairapi te rakṣaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyaiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1457: bhavanti, teṣāṃ ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye samutsukā bhavantīti //
T02bsu030_u:1463: kimāyuṣman subhūte tūṣṇīṃbhāvenātināmayasi? kiṃ na pratibhāti te prajñāpāramitāmārabhya ayaṃ śāstā svayaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ, iyaṃ ca parṣad
T02bsu030_u:1464: bhājanībhūtā gambhīrāyā dharmadeśanāyāḥ? śuddheyamāyuṣman subhūte parṣat,
T02bsu030_u:1466: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramevamāha - nāhaṃ tamāyuṣman dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ me ārabhya pratibhāyāt - na cāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyāmi, na ca bodhisattvaṃ nāpi
T02bsu030_u:1467: pratibhānam, nāpi yatpratibhāyāt, nāpi yena pratibhāyāt, nāpi yataḥ pratibhāyāt /
T02bsu030_u:1468: evaṃ samanupaśyan nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yacca pratibhāyāt, yena ca pratibhāyāt, yataśca pratibhāyāt, yasya ca pratibhāyāt, kimiti
T02bsu030_u:1470: eṣaivātra āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā yo 'vyāhāraḥ, anudāhāraḥ, anabhihāraḥ,
T02bsu030_u:1472: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā śakyodāhārtuṃ
T02bsu030_u:1475: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
T02bsu030_u:1476: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītalakṣaṇā vā śakyā nirdeṣṭum, anāgatalakṣaṇā vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇā vā
T02bsu030_u:1477: / alakṣaṇā avyavahārā eṣā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1478: nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāyā lakṣaṇaṃ samanupaśyāmi, yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā nirdiśyeta /
T02bsu030_u:1479: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra yadrūpasya atītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1480: nāpi yadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmatītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1481: yacca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannarūpalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, sā prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1482: yā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T02bsu030_u:1483: yā ca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannasya rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā
T02bsu030_u:1484: yāvattathatā, sā na śakyā prajñapayituṃ vā udāhartuṃ vā abhilapituṃ vā
T02bsu030_u:1488: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśalakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā, na rūpanidarśanalakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānanirdeśalakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā, na
T02bsu030_u:1491: dharmadhātulakṣaṇena, na saṃyogalakṣaṇena, na visaṃyogalakṣaṇena, na
T02bsu030_u:1492: hetulakṣaṇena, na pratyayalakṣaṇena, na duḥkhalakṣaṇena, (Vaidya 40) na
T02bsu030_u:1494: notpādalakṣaṇena na vyayalakṣaṇena, na saṃkleśalakṣaṇena na
T02bsu030_u:1495: vyavadānalakṣaṇena, na prakṛtilakṣaṇena, (na) saṃvṛtilakṣaṇena na paramārthalakṣaṇena, na satyalakṣaṇena na mṛṣālakṣaṇena, na saṃkrāntilakṣaṇena nāvakrāntilakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā tatkasya hetoḥ?
T02bsu030_u:1497: sā na kasyaciddarśanamupaiti - iyaṃ vā prajñāpāramitā, iha vā prajñāpāramitā,
T02bsu030_u:1498: anena vā prajñāpāramitā, asya vā prajñāpāramiteti //
T02bsu030_u:1499: nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā nirdiśyeta
T02bsu030_u:1500: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanamupaiti vā utpaśyati vā /
T02bsu030_u:1501: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya nidarśanamupaiti, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nidarśanamupaiti, na cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanasāṃ nidarśanamupaiti /
T02bsu030_u:1502: nāpi dhātvāyatanānāṃ nidarśanamupaiti, na pratītyasamutpādasya nidarśanamupaiti, nāpi vidyāvimuktyornidarśanamupaiti
T02bsu030_u:1503: yāpi sā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñā lokottarā nirvedhagāminī, tasyā api prajñāpāramitā nidarśanaṃ nopaiti /
T02bsu030_u:1504: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo nidarśanaṃ nopaiti
T02bsu030_u:1505: kasyaciddharmasya, kathaṃ tasyā eva udāhāranirdeśo bhaviṣyati? api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmanayaṃ prajānanti, te prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ prajānanti //
T02bsu030_u:1506: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena
T02bsu030_u:1508: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanen
T02bsu030_u:1509: na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1510: na nāmarūpasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1511: na saṃkleśasya na vyavadānasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1512: na pratītyasamutpādasya saṃdarśanen pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1513: na viparyāsānāṃ saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1515: sattvadhātoḥ, nātmadhātoḥ saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1517: pṛthivīdhātoḥ, na aptejovāyudhātoḥ saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā, na nidarśanena /
T02bsu030_u:1518: na kāmadhātoḥ, na rūpadhātoḥ, na ārūpyadhātoḥ saṃdarśanena
T02bsu030_u:1528: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1529: nāpyanutpādajñānasya vā kṣayajñānasya vā nirodhajñānasya vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1530: nāpi nirvāṇasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
T02bsu030_u:1531: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā pratyupasthitā nidarśanena vā, kathaṃ tasyā vyavahāraṃ
