T02bsu030_u:1532: nirdekṣyāmi? api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ nirdeśamavabudhyate - na prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthiteti, sa prajñāpāramitāṃ jānīte,
T02bsu030_u:1534: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya yogāya vā viyogāya vā pratyupasthitā
T02bsu030_u:1535: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ
T02bsu030_u:1537: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1539: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1540: na pṛthivīdhātuṃ nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1541: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1542: na dānaṃ na mātsaryaṃ na śīlaṃ na dauḥśīlyaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vyāpādaṃ na vīryaṃ na kausīdyaṃ na dhyānaṃ na vikṣepaṃ na prajñāṃ na dauṣprajñyaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1543: na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇāni na ṛddhipādāpramāṇāni nendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāḥ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1544: na mārgaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhasamudayaṃ na nirodhaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati
T02bsu030_u:1545: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na bodhisattvabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1546: na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na bodhisattvadharmān na buddhadharmān saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1548: nāsaṅgatānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ na nirvāṇaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1549: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo na kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitaḥ, kathaṃ tasya nirdeśo bhaviṣyati? idamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra arthavaśaṃ
T02bsu030_u:1550: saṃpaśyannahamevaṃ vadāmi - nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo me dharmaḥ
T02bsu030_u:1551: pratibhāyāt, yena me pratibhāyāt, yato me pratibhāyāt, yaṃ me ārabhya
T02bsu030_u:1557: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - iha khalu suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kvaciddharme carati /
T02bsu030_u:1560: tadyathā suvikrāntavikrāmin kasmiṃściddharme carati, viparyāse sa carati /
T02bsu030_u:1564: nāpi viparyāse vā abhūte vā caran bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu030_u:1566: na tatra kāciccaryā, tena tatra bodhisattvo na carati /
T02bsu030_u:1570: ye ca na tathā yathā gṛhītāḥ, sa ucyate 'viparyāso
T02bsu030_u:1572: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse vā abhūte vā carati /
T02bsu030_u:1575: yatra ca bhūtamaviparyāsaḥ, tatra ca na kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1578: sā na śakyā ādarśayitum - iyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryā, anena vā bodhisattvacaryā, iha vā bodhisattvacaryā, ito vā bodhisattvacaryeti /
T02bsu030_u:1580: sarvacaryāvinivṛttaye hi bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti pṛthagjanacaryāvinivṛttaye śrāvakacaryāvinivṛtaye pratyekabuddhacaryāvinivṛttaye /
T02bsu030_u:1581: ye 'pi te suvikrāntavikrāmin buddhadharmāḥ, teṣvapi bodhisattvā na caranti nābhiniviśante - ime vā te
T02bsu030_u:1582: bodhisattvadharmāḥ, iha vā te bodhisattvadharmāḥ, anena vā te
T02bsu030_u:1583: bodhisattvadharmāḥ, asya vā te bodhisattvadharmā iti /
T02bsu030_u:1592: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmaḥ kalpo vā vikalpo vā /
T02bsu030_u:1593: kalpa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin eṣa eko 'ntaḥ, vikalpa iti dvitīyo 'ntaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1594: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'nte carati, nāpyanante /
T02bsu030_u:1595: yo naiva ante na anante carati, sa madhyaṃ na samanupaśyati /
T02bsu030_u:1596: madhyamapi suvikrāntavikrāmin samanupaśyan madhye caran anta eva carati /
T02bsu030_u:1597: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin madhyasya kāciccaryā (vā kiṃci)ddarśanaṃ vā(nidarśanaṃ vā) /
T02bsu030_u:1599: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena
T02bsu030_u:1601: api tu yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati, tadā pratiprasrabdhamārga ityucyate /
T02bsu030_u:1602: sa sarvadharmān na bhāvayanna vibhāvayan bhāvanāsamatikrānto
T02bsu030_u:1604: pravartate, kutaḥ punarmārgaṃ drakṣyati? pratiprasrabdhamārga iti suvikrāntavikrāmin arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadbhikṣoradhivacanam /
T02bsu030_u:1605: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? vibhāvito hi sa mārgo na bhāvito na vibhāvitaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1607: vibhāvanāpi tatra nāsti, tenocyate vibhāvita iti
T02bsu030_u:1609: sacetkhalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bhāvanā syādvibhāvanā vā, sā punarupalabhyate, nāsyā vibhāvanā syāt /
T02bsu030_u:1610: vibhāvaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin vigatā asyāṃ bhāvaneti vibhāvanā, bhāvo 'syā vigata iti, tenocyate vibhāvaneti, na punaryathocyate /
T02bsu030_u:1611: tatkasmāt? avyāhārā hi vibhāvanā, vigama eṣa vibhāvanā /
T02bsu030_u:1612: katamo vigamaḥ? yato viparyāsasya asamutthānaṃ yadabhūtasyāsamutthānam /
T02bsu030_u:1613: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāso viparyāsaṃ samutthāpayati /
T02bsu030_u:1624: na viparyāse viparyāsaḥ saṃvidyate, tena aviparyastāḥ sarvadharmāḥ
T02bsu030_u:1626: yaśca aviparyāsasyānubodhaḥ, na tatra bhūyo viparyāsaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1628: sarvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin caryā sā caryāsamutthānā /
T02bsu030_u:1634: acaryeti suvikrāntavikrāmin yanna kvaciddharme carati na vicarati na caryālakṣaṇaṃ saṃdarśayati, iyamucyate bodhisattvacaryeti /
T02bsu030_u:1635: ya evaṃ carati, sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
T02bsu030_u:1636: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati
T02bsu030_u:1639: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvārambaṇāni hi tena viviktāni vijñātāni /
T02bsu030_u:1642: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścakṣurārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām, na śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1648: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1652: yena viparyāsaḥ abhūtaḥ parijñātaḥ, sa na kasmiṃścidārambaṇe carati /
T02bsu030_u:1654: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāmarūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1662: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? parijñātā hi taiḥ sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca -
T02bsu030_u:1664: yaiśca abhūtā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca jñātā, na te kasyāṃciccaryāyāṃ caranti /
T02bsu030_u:1665: ye na kasyāciccaryāyāṃ caranti, tena ca caryā apagatā /
T02bsu030_u:1667: ye na suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ vā poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavotthāpakasamutthāpakakārakakārayitṛvedakavedayitṛsaṃjñāyāṃ jñātṛjñāpakasaṃjñāyāṃ carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti /
T02bsu030_u:1669: yaiśca vibhāvitāḥ sarvasaṃjñāḥ, na te bhūyaḥ kasyāṃcitsaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
T02bsu030_u:1671: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā viparyāsairvā dṛṣṭigatairvā nīvaraṇairvā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1676: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1679: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca, tatra na kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1681: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1687: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1689: yā ca parijñā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇasya, tasyāṃ na kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1691: na (Vaidya 45) hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1694: yā ca parijñā sarvārambaṇānām, tatra na kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1696: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1699: yā ca vaśikā ārambaṇaparijñā, tasyā na kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1701: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1703: yā ca vibhāvanā, tasyā na kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1705: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1707: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tasyāṃ kācidbhāvanā, na ca tasyāṃ bhūyaḥ kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1709: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1712: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1714: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1716: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kācidbhūyaścaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1718: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1720: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1722: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1725: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1727: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām
T02bsu030_u:1730: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1732: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1735: yā ca parijñā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1737: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām, na buddhakṣetrapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaḥ, na śrāvakasaṃpadārambaṇe carantaḥ, na bodhisattvasaṃpadārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1741: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1746: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati /
T02bsu030_u:1748: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena rūpārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
T02bsu030_u:1750: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1751: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati, na śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaārambaṇaviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:1756: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1757: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena yāvaddharmārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
T02bsu030_u:1758: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1759: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati
T02bsu030_u:1760: / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena nāmarūpārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
T02bsu030_u:1761: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1762: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1764: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1765: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1769: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati
T02bsu030_u:1772: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1773: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1775: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1778: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1781: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1785: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1788: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati
T02bsu030_u:1791: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati
T02bsu030_u:1792: / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena asaṅgārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
T02bsu030_u:1793: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1796: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
T02bsu030_u:1797: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena sarvajñatārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
T02bsu030_u:1798: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām, yanna kasyāṃcidārambaṇaviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:1800: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
T02bsu030_u:1801: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
T02bsu030_u:1802: anena rūpamiti na samanupaśyati, asya rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
T02bsu030_u:1804: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati, na rūpamutpādayati na nirodhayati, na rūpe carati na vicarati, na rūpārambaṇe carati na vicarati /
T02bsu030_u:1807: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ, idaṃ vijñānamiti na samanupaśyati, anena vijñānamiti na samanupaśyati, asya vijñānamiti na samanupaśyati,
T02bsu030_u:1809: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati, na vijñānamutpādayati na nirodhayati, na vijñāne carati na vicarati, na vijñānārambaṇe carati na vicarati /
T02bsu030_u:1811: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti
T02bsu030_u:1812: carati, na rūpamanāgatamiti carati, na rūpaṃ pratyutpannamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1816: na rūpamātmeti carati, na rūpamātmīyamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1818: na vijñānamātmeti carati, na vijñānamātmīyamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1827: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati, na rūpanirodhe carati, na rūpaṃ gambhīramiti carati,
T02bsu030_u:1828: na rūpamuttānamiti carati, na rūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati, na rūpamaśūnyamiti carati, na rūpaṃ nimittamiti carati, na rūpamanimittamiti carati, na rūpaṃ praṇihitamiti carati, rūpamapraṇihitamiti carati, na rūpamabhisaṃskāramiti carati, na rūpamanabhisasṃkāramiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1830: na vijñānasamudaye carati, na vijñānanirodhe carati, na vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti carati, na vijñānamuttānamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ śūnyamiti
T02bsu030_u:1831: carati, na vijñānamaśūnyamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ nimittamiti carati, na vijñānamanimittamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ praṇihitamiti carati, na vijñānapraṇihitamiti carati, na vijñānamabhisaṃskāramiti carati, na vijñānamabhisaṃskāramiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1832: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni
T02bsu030_u:1833: ahaṃ carāmīti spanditametat, iha carāmīti prapañcitametat, anena carāmīti tṛṣṇāgatametat, asmiṃścarāmīti manyitametat /
T02bsu030_u:1834: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante, amanyamānā na kvaciccaranti, na kvacidālīyante /
T02bsu030_u:1835: te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti, na samutthāpayanti /
T02bsu030_u:1836: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
T02bsu030_u:1837: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati, na rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamiti carati, na rūpaṃ māyopamamiti carati, na rūpaṃ svapnopamamiti carati, na rūpaṃ pratibhāsopamamiti carati, na rūpaṃ pratiśrutkopamamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1839: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ svapnopamamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ pratibhāsopamamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ pratiśrutkopamamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:1840: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni /
T02bsu030_u:1841: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu030_u:1843: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat - acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1852: viparyāsācintyatayā acintyeyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā, dṛṣṭigatācintyatayā acintyeyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1874: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā, tenocyate acintyeti //
T02bsu030_u:1877: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā /
T02bsu030_u:1879: tatra cittamapi vivṛtam, yena viparyāsenotpadyate tadati vivṛtam /
T02bsu030_u:1880: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti /
T02bsu030_u:1881: yatrāpyutpadyeta tadapi vivṛtam, yenāpyutpadyeta tadapi vivṛtamiti /
T02bsu030_u:1883: ārambaṇavivekamajānantaḥ abhiniviśante - ahaṃ cittam, mama cittam, asya
T02bsu030_u:1887: sukhamiti vā abhiniviśante, duḥkhamiti vā abhiniviśante /
T02bsu030_u:1913: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati /
T02bsu030_u:1915: yā ca cittasya prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā prakṛtipariśuddhatā, tatra na kāciccittasyotpattiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1918: kutaścittamutpadyate? sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate - prakṛtiprabhāsvaramidaṃ cittam /
T02bsu030_u:1919: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ārambaṇaṃ pratītya cittamutpadyate iti /
T02bsu030_u:1920: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati /
T02bsu030_u:1921: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham /
T02bsu030_u:1922: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati /
T02bsu030_u:1924: ya evaṃ carati bodhisattvaḥ, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu030_u:1925: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām, asyāṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
T02bsu030_u:1927: sacetpunaḥ saṃjānīte - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā, anena prajñāpāramitā, asya vā prajñāpāramiteti, na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
T02bsu030_u:1928: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
T02bsu030_u:1930: anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1931: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1932: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1933: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1934: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā punaḥ kaiścinnimittacaritairupalambhacaritairātmadṛṣṭibhiḥ sattvadṛṣṭibhirjīvadṛṣṭibhiḥ pudgaladṛṣṭibhirbhavadṛṣṭibhirvibhavadṛṣṭibhirucchedadṛṣṭibhiḥ śāścatadṛṣṭibhiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭibhiḥ skandhadṛṣṭibhirdhātudṛṣṭibhirāyatanadṛṣṭibhirbuddhadṛṣṭibhirdharmadṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃghadṛṣṭibhirnirvāṇadṛṣṭibhiḥ prāptasaṃprajñairvā adhimānikairvā rāgadveṣamohacaritairvā (Vaidya 51) viparyāsacaritairvā utpathonmārgaprasthitairvā anākramaṇīyā /
T02bsu030_u:1935: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā //
T02bsu030_u:1936: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat /
T02bsu030_u:1937: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā, antaśo nirvāṇadṛṣṭikairapi nirvāṇābhiniviṣṭairvā anākramaṇīyā sarvabālapṛthagjanairvā /
T02bsu030_u:1942: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat, na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro 'bhaviṣyat - śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā
T02bsu030_u:1944: bodhisattvā evābhaviṣyan, te 'pi tathāgatā vā caturvaiśāradyaprāptā
T02bsu030_u:1946: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā, tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti, na ca tathāgatā bhavanti caturvaiśāradyaprāptāḥ vaiśāradyabhūmiriyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin dharme, neyaṃ prajñāpāramitācaryā /
T02bsu030_u:1947: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti, anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ
T02bsu030_u:1948: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena /
T02bsu030_u:1949: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati, nāpi tathāgatasteṣāṃ caturvaiśāradyamadhitiṣṭhati /
T02bsu030_u:1953: katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ dharmapratisaṃvidaṃ niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvidam
T02bsu030_u:1954: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti /
T02bsu030_u:1955: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena /
T02bsu030_u:1956: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam //
T02bsu030_u:1957: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam, yatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ na yojayati /
T02bsu030_u:1959: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1966: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1967: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1968: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1972: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1977: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1979: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1980: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na
T02bsu030_u:1982: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
T02bsu030_u:1996: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kācidasti bhāvapariniṣpattiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:1999: abhāvasvabhāvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ, abhūtā asaṃbhūtāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2009: yaśca abhāva, tatra na bhāvanā na vibhāvanā /
T02bsu030_u:2010: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca /
T02bsu030_u:2012: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? abhāvasvabhāvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ, bhāvāpagatā vastvasattvāt
T02bsu030_u:2014: yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati, iyamucyate prajñāpāramitābhāvaneti /
T02bsu030_u:2015: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
T02bsu030_u:2017: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate /
T02bsu030_u:2043: so 'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā /
T02bsu030_u:2044: sattvasaṃjñā cānena vibhāvitā bhavati, na ca sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ tiṣṭhati, na caināṃścaturo brāhmyān vihārānabhiniviśate, prājñaśca bhavatyupāyakauśalyasamanvāgataḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2045: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati
T02bsu030_u:2046: / sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti, nopādatte /
T02bsu030_u:2047: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu030_u:2051: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti, nopādatte /
T02bsu030_u:2069: nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte /
T02bsu030_u:2083: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2085: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? asārakā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā māyopamatayā /
T02bsu030_u:2093: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya
T02bsu030_u:2096: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte, nādhitiṣṭhati,
T02bsu030_u:2098: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2099: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
T02bsu030_u:2100: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
T02bsu030_u:2102: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
T02bsu030_u:2103: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate /
T02bsu030_u:2104: na rūpotpattau śikṣate, na rūpanirodhe śikṣate /
T02bsu030_u:2105: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2106: na vijñānotpattau śikṣate, na vijñānanirodhe śikṣate /
T02bsu030_u:2111: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye, na sthitaye śikṣate nāsthitaye /
T02bsu030_u:2112: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate, na rūpasukhatāyāṃ śikṣate, na rūpaduḥkhatāyāṃ śikṣate na rūpaśubhatāyām, na rūpānātmatāyāṃ śikṣate /
T02bsu030_u:2113: na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ, na vijñānanityatāyāṃ śikṣate, na vijñānasukhatāyāṃ śikṣate, na vijñānaduḥkhatāyām, na vijñānaśubhatāyāṃ na vijñānātmatāyāṃ śikṣate /
T02bsu030_u:2114: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
T02bsu030_u:2120: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate
T02bsu030_u:2123: anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti
T02bsu030_u:2125: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
T02bsu030_u:2127: atītaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena (Vaidya 55) vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā, evamapi na carati /
T02bsu030_u:2128: anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā
T02bsu030_u:2130: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti, evamapi na carati /
T02bsu030_u:2131: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
T02bsu030_u:2132: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
T02bsu030_u:2133: evaṃ caran sarvamārakarmāṇi budhyate, na ca tairmārakarmabhiḥ saṃhriyate //
T02bsu030_u:2134: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate, na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān, na vijñānamālambate /
T02bsu030_u:2173: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta /
T02bsu030_u:2174: yāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin ālambanam, tāvadadhyavasānam, tāvadabhiniveśaḥ, tāvadupādānam
T02bsu030_u:2175: yāvadupādānam, yāvadālambanam, tāvaduḥkhadaurmanasyam, tāvadgāḍhāḥ śokaśalyopāyāsaparidevāḥ saṃbhavanti /
T02bsu030_u:2184: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate /
T02bsu030_u:2186: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate /
T02bsu030_u:2187: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati, na kaṃciddharmamadhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu030_u:2188: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
T02bsu030_u:2189: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati /
T02bsu030_u:2190: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum, na mārakāyikā devatāḥ, na māraparṣat, na mārādhiṣṭhitāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2191: na cāsya te 'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ, yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā dharṣayeyuḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2198: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām
T02bsu030_u:2199: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām /
T02bsu030_u:2201: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati /
T02bsu030_u:2226: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati /
T02bsu030_u:2227: (Vaidya 57) na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
T02bsu030_u:2232: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
T02bsu030_u:2239: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? kalpanāyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin satyāṃ vikalpo bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2240: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpanā nāsti, na tatra vikalpanā /
T02bsu030_u:2247: tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:2248: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2251: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na
T02bsu030_u:2254: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2264: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
T02bsu030_u:2266: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
T02bsu030_u:2269: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyānantarāyasthito bhavati, na ca māraparṣat /
T02bsu030_u:2272: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca /
T02bsu030_u:2278: bhavati, vigatamohāndhakāraśca bhavati, pratilabdhacakṣurālokabhūtaśca bhavati sarvasattvānām, sthitaśca bhavatyunucchedāya buddhavaṃśasya,
T02bsu030_u:2280: bhavati sarvasattvānām, viśuddhaṃ cakṣurbhavati dharmeṣu, vīryasaṃpannaśca
T02bsu030_u:2281: bhavatyakusīdaḥ, kṣāntibalapratilabdhaśca bhavatyavyāpannacittaḥ, dhyāyī ca bhavatyaniśritadhyāyī, pratilabdhaprajñaśca bhavati nirvedhikaprajñāsamanvāgataḥ, vigatakaukṛtyaśca bhavati apagatanīvaraṇaḥ,
T02bsu030_u:2282: visaṃyuktaśca bhavati sarvamārapāśaiḥ, chinnabandhanaśca bhavati sarvatṛṣṇājālaviyogāt, upasthitasmṛtiśca bhavatyasaṃpramoṣadharmatayā,
T02bsu030_u:2285: prajñābalādhānaprāptaśca bhavatyaprakampyatayā, anākṣiptaśva bhavati sarvamāraparavādibhiḥ, aparihīṇadharmā ca bhavati
T02bsu030_u:2287: amaṅkuśca bhavati parṣadupasaṃkramaṇāya, anāgṛhītaśca bhavati muktatyāgo
T02bsu030_u:2289: vibhāvitabhāvanaśca bhavati kumārgāparijñatayā, vāsitavāsanaśca bhavati viśuddhadharmatayā, śodhitaśodhanaśca bhavati viśuddhaprajñatayā,
T02bsu030_u:2290: gambhīraprajñaśca bhavati sāgaropamatayā, duravagāhaśca bhavati astambhitatayā, aprameyaśca bhavati dharmasāgarāprameyatayā /
T02bsu030_u:2291: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantum //
T02bsu030_u:2292: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati
T02bsu030_u:2293: sa na rūpavikalo bhavati, na bhogavikalo bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2294: na parivāravikalo bhavati, na jātivikalo bhavati, na kulavikalo bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2295: na deśavikalo bhavati, na ca pratyunteṣu janapadeṣūpapadyate, na cākṣaṇaprāpto bhavati, na cāpariśuddhaiḥ sattvairapariśuddhakarmāntaiḥ
T02bsu030_u:2296: saṃsargajāto bhavati, na ca svacittaṃ hāpayati, na ca prajñāyā hīyate /
T02bsu030_u:2297: sa yān dharmān parataḥ śṛṇoti, tān sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ saṃsyandayati,
T02bsu030_u:2299: sa ālokalabdhaśca bhavati buddhadharmeṣu, atyāsannaśca bhavati sarvajñatāyām
T02bsu030_u:2300: / taṃ sacenmāraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanārtham, sa tanmāraparṣadaṃ bhasmīkaroti chinnapratibhānām, sarvāṃśca mārapāśāṃśchinatti,
T02bsu030_u:2303: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati - atikrāntaviṣayo 'yaṃ mama,
T02bsu030_u:2304: nāyaṃ mama bhūyo viṣaye carati, nāyaṃ mama bhūyo viṣaye sthitaḥ, nāyaṃ mama bhūyo viṣayamākramiṣyatīti, anyāṃśca sattvān mama
T02bsu030_u:2306: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate - alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti
T02bsu030_u:2307: daurbalyaṃ cāsya viśati, duḥkhitaśca bhavati durmanā vipratisārī /
T02bsu030_u:2308: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
T02bsu030_u:2310: sarvamārabhavanāni tasmin samaye dhyāmībhavanti alpatejaskāni, mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā
T02bsu030_u:2314: chedayiṣyatyayaṃ sattvān mārapāśāt, samutkṣepsyatyayaṃ sattvān kāmapaṅkalagnān, mocayiṣyatyayaṃ sattvān dṛṣṭijālebhyaḥ, uttārayiṣyatyayaṃ sattvān nīvaraṇapathāt, pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyatyayaṃ sattvān sanmārge,
T02bsu030_u:2316: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ
T02bsu030_u:2317: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)manā mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgataḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2318: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2319: na ca svake āsane ramate, yasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2321: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti - kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, kiṃ nu kariṣyāmaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2323: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2324: tatra bodhisattvasya romāpi na hṛṣyati, na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā /
T02bsu030_u:2327: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2329: / tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamevāsya na śakto 'vatāraṃ labdhum, kiṃ punarmama parṣat, kiṃ punaryadanye 'dhiṣṭhāsyanti /
T02bsu030_u:2332: pradhyāyantastiṣṭhanti, na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum, prāgevāsyāntarāyam /
T02bsu030_u:2334: evaṃrūpaṃ prajñābalādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati, evaṃrūpeṇa ca prajñābalādhiṣṭhānena samanvāgato bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2335: sacedye sarvasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ, te sarve mārā
T02bsu030_u:2336: bhaveyuḥ, te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ
T02bsu030_u:2338: te 'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum /
T02bsu030_u:2339: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2340: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2341: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum /
T02bsu030_u:2343: prajñāśastram, mahākhaḍgo hyeṣa suvikrāntavikrāmin yaduta prajñākhaḍgaḥ,
T02bsu030_u:2346: tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ, catasṛṇāṃ vā ārūpyasamāpattīnām, ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu (Vaidya 60) sadevanikāyeṣu, teṣāmapi tāvadagatiraviṣayaḥ yaduta evaṃrūpāyāṃ prajñāyām, yā bodhisattvasya prajñā
T02bsu030_u:2347: prākṛtā, kiṃ punaryā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñā, kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau /
T02bsu030_u:2348: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena /
T02bsu030_u:2349: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa, adhṛṣyāste bhavanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiranākramaṇīyāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2350: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa, na te kvacinniśrayaṃ kurvanti, aniśritāste bhavanti /
T02bsu030_u:2351: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2352: calite sati spandanā bhavati, spandanāyāṃ satyāṃ prapañcanā bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2353: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca) bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā
T02bsu030_u:2355: ye 'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā
T02bsu030_u:2357: aparimuktāśca te mārapāśebhyaḥ, anugatasūtrāśca te mārapāśaiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2358: tadyathā udrakaśca rāmaputraḥ ārāḍaśca kālāmaḥ, ye vā punaranye 'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2359: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti, aniśrito bhavati sarvatra /
T02bsu030_u:2360: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati, tasmin samaye na
T02bsu030_u:2361: rūpaniśrito bhavati, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaniśrito bhavati, na viparyāsanīvaraṇadṛṣṭigataniśrito bhavati, na nāmarūpaniśrito bhavati, na kāmarūpārūpyadhātuniśrito bhavati, nātmasattvasaṃjñāniśrito bhavati, na jīvapudgaladhātvāyatananiśrito bhavati, na pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānenaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatananiśrito bhavati, na tṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati, na bhavatṛṣṇāniśrito bhavati, nocchedatṛṣṇāniśrito
T02bsu030_u:2362: bhavati, nāntānantaniśrito bhavati, na pratītyasamutpādaniśrito bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2363: na dānamātsaryaniśrito bhavati, na śīlaśauḥśīlyaniśrito bhavati, na kṣāntivyāpādaniśrito bhavati, na vīryakausīdyaniśrito bhavati, na dhyānavikṣepaniśrito bhavati, na prajñādauṣprajñyaniśrito bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2366: nānutpādajñānakṣayajñānānabhisaṃskārajñānaniśrito bhavati, na vidyāvimuktiniśrito bhavati, na vimuktijñānadarśananiśrito bhavati, na pṛthagjanaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūminiśrito bhavati, na pṛthagjanaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhadharmaniśrito bhavati, na nīvaraṇaniśrito bhavati, nātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgatāniśrito bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2367: na tryadhvasamatāniśrito bhavati, na buddhajñānabalavaiśāradyaniśrito bhavati, na sarvajñajñānaniśrito (Vaidya 61) bhavati, na lakṣaṇasaṃpattiniśrito bhavati, na buddhakṣetrasaṃpanniśrito bhavati, na śrāvakavyūhasaṃpanniśrito bhavati, na bodhisattvavyūhasaṃpanniśrito bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2368: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati, niśrayāśca tena sarve vibhāvitā bhavanti
T02bsu030_u:2371: so 'yaṃ niśraya iti nopalabhate, iha niśraya iti
T02bsu030_u:2372: nopalabhate, asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate, asmānniśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate
T02bsu030_u:2374: 'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu030_u:2378: carataḥ, yenāsya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labhante, anākramaṇīyaśca bhavati sarvamāraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ, abhibhavati ca mārān pāpīyasa iti //
T02bsu030_u:2383: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2385: kṛtādhikāraśca bhavati buddhānāṃ bhagavatām, adhyāśayasaṃpannaśca bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2390: so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso 'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca - yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labheran, mā ca me
T02bsu030_u:2392: tasyādhiṣṭhāne mārā avatāraṃ na labhante, na cāsyāntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti, nāpi cittamutpādayanti - kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe, viheṭhanāṃ kuryāmaha iti /
T02bsu030_u:2394: bhayaṃ ca teṣāṃ mahatpratyupasthitaṃ bhavati, saṃvignāśca bhavanti - mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti /
T02bsu030_u:2397: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya
T02bsu030_u:2399: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati, nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati, nāpyanena jātu dharmavyavasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2401: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti, sarvāsu ṣaṭpāramitāsu saṃharṣitā bhavanti samuttejitāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2402: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso
T02bsu030_u:2403: 'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti, nāpi tasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ
T02bsu030_u:2406: na ca mārakarmabhiḥ saṃhriyate, na ca mārakarmavaśago bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2407: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti //
T02bsu030_u:2408: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati, na rūpavisaṃyoganimitte carati, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānayoganimitte carati, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānavisaṃyoganimitte carati /
T02bsu030_u:2409: na rūpalakṣaṇayoganimitte carati, na rūpalakṣaṇavisaṃyoganimitte carati, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇasaṃyoganimitte carati /
T02bsu030_u:2411: na rūpaviśuddhinimitte carati, na rūpaviśuddhyanimitte carati, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaviśuddhinimitte (Vaidya 63) carati, na vedanā -
T02bsu030_u:2412: na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati /
T02bsu030_u:2413: na rūpārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati, na rūpārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati,
T02bsu030_u:2414: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati /
T02bsu030_u:2418: na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2419: na rūpārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati
T02bsu030_u:2420: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2421: na rūpaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:2422: na rūpārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2423: na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:2424: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā -
T02bsu030_u:2426: na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā -
T02bsu030_u:2427: na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2428: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā - na saṃjñā -
T02bsu030_u:2429: na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
T02bsu030_u:2440: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
T02bsu030_u:2464: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na
T02bsu030_u:2466: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena
T02bsu030_u:2467: saṃyoga iti hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śāśvatapadametat, visaṃyoga ityuccheda eṣaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2468: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā /
T02bsu030_u:2469: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya /
T02bsu030_u:2470: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat, labdho
T02bsu030_u:2471: 'bhaviṣyaddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā, utthāpako vā utthāpayitā vā,
T02bsu030_u:2472: samutthāpako vā samutthāpayitā (vā), vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā /
T02bsu030_u:2474: ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā, utthāpako vā utthāpayitā vā,
T02bsu030_u:2475: samutthāpako vā samutthāpayitā vā, vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā /
T02bsu030_u:2476: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya, tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā, utthāpako vā utthāpayitā vā,
T02bsu030_u:2477: samutthāpako vā samutthāpayitā vā, vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā samupalabhyate /
T02bsu030_u:2480: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā /
T02bsu030_u:2481: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāsasya vastūpalabhyate,
T02bsu030_u:2485: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo 'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta /
T02bsu030_u:2486: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām, ullāpanaiṣā sattvānām, abhūtaparikalpa eṣa sattvānām, manyanā spandanā prapañcanaiṣā sattvānām /
T02bsu030_u:2487: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
T02bsu030_u:2488: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante - bhūtametaditi /
T02bsu030_u:2489: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt /
T02bsu030_u:2490: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti
T02bsu030_u:2491: te (Vaidya 65) saṃyoga iti manyante, te saṃyoga ityupalabhante, saṃyoga iti sthāpitaṃ paśyanti, saṃyoga ityabhiniviśante /
T02bsu030_u:2493: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate, na visaṃyogamapi sa manyate, so 'tyantavimuktaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2494: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā, saṃyukta evāsau bhavenna visaṃyuktaḥ
T02bsu030_u:2495: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya
T02bsu030_u:2497: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2498: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati //
T02bsu030_u:2499: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu030_u:2500: na rūpāsaṅgaviśuddhau carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:2501: na rūpāsaṅgārambaṇe carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati
T02bsu030_u:2502: na rūpāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati, na rūpāsaṅgatāvisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2503: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati, na vijñānāsaṅgatāvisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2504: na rūpāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpāsaṅgatāviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati
T02bsu030_u:2505: / na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2506: na rūpārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpārambaṇaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati
T02bsu030_u:2507: / na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
T02bsu030_u:2509: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni /
T02bsu030_u:2511: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati, na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu030_u:2512: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati, na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅganāyāṃ carati /
T02bsu030_u:2513: na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati, na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannāviśuddhau carati
T02bsu030_u:2514: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati, na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:2516: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇaviśuddhau carati, na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇāviśuddhau carati /
T02bsu030_u:2517: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati
T02bsu030_u:2520: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
T02bsu030_u:2522: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati, na rūpamavivṛtamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:2523: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2524: na vijñānaṃ vivṛtamiti carati, na vijñānamavivṛtamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:2525: na rūpaṃ śāntamiti carati, rūpamaśāntamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:2526: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2527: na vijñānaṃ śāntamiti carati, na vijñānamaśāntamiti carati /
T02bsu030_u:2528: na rūpaṃ prakṛtivivṛtamiti carati, na rūpaṃ prakṛtyavivṛtamiti
T02bsu030_u:2530: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2534: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2536: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati /
T02bsu030_u:2537: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati
T02bsu030_u:2538: / na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2539: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati, na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā
T02bsu030_u:2541: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
T02bsu030_u:2542: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate /
T02bsu030_u:2543: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
T02bsu030_u:2545: / rūpaviśuddhiṃ na manyate, rūpārambaṇaviśuddhiṃ na manyate /
T02bsu030_u:2547: vijñānaviśuddhiṃ na manyate, vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhiṃ na manyate //
T02bsu030_u:2558: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati /
T02bsu030_u:2559: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2562: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām /
T02bsu030_u:2570: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati
T02bsu030_u:2574: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate, na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñāneṣu pratiṣṭhate /
T02bsu030_u:2577: na kāmarūpārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhate, nātmadhātau, na sattvadhātau pratiṣṭhate /
T02bsu030_u:2606: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate /
T02bsu030_u:2610: sacetsuvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānamabhaviṣyat, ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat,
T02bsu030_u:2611: darśayiṣyattathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam - idaṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam,
T02bsu030_u:2612: ayaṃ dharmāṇāmālayaḥ, ayaṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcaya iti /
T02bsu030_u:2613: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ, tasmānna kaściddharmaḥ kūṭasthaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2614: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati /
T02bsu030_u:2616: pariniṣpannāḥ, nāpi svabhāvaḥ kaścit, asaṃbhavādapariniṣpattito dharmāṇāṃ na kaścidavatiṣṭhate
T02bsu030_u:2620: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt, evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ nāsti sthitiḥ, yāvadanabhisaṃskāraṃ na kṣapayanti /
T02bsu030_u:2621: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam, sarvatraiṣā gaṇanā nāsti /
T02bsu030_u:2622: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā /
T02bsu030_u:2626: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānayogaḥ (Vaidya 68) prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2627: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati, āsannaśca bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, kṣipraṃ ca bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrāmati, kṣipraṃ ca sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilabhate, kṣipraṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannajñānaparipūrimadhigacchati, kṣipraṃ ca sarvasattvacittacaritavispanditānāṃ pāraṃ gacchati //
T02bsu030_u:2628: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ dānaṃ dātukāmena, sarvasattvān dharmadānena saṃtarpayitukāmena, sarvasattvānāmavidyāṇḍakośaṃ bhettukāmena,
T02bsu030_u:2630: sarvasattvānāmanukampakena bhavitukāmena, sarvasatvānāṃ hitaiṣiṇā bhavitukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ dharmasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ bhogasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvāṃ śīlabhikṣaṃ kartukāmena,
T02bsu030_u:2631: sarvasattvānāṃ kṣāntisauratyasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvāṃ vīryasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ dhyānabhikṣaṃ kartukāmena,
T02bsu030_u:2632: sarvasattvānāṃ prajñāsubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ vimukṣisubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ svargopapattisubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ vidyāvimuktisubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena,
T02bsu030_u:2633: sarvasattvānāṃ vumuktijñānadarśanasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ nīvaraṇasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ buddhadharmasubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena, sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpatsubhikṣaṃ kartukāmena,
T02bsu030_u:2634: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa, dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena, buddhabhūmau vyākartukāmena,
T02bsu030_u:2636: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam /
T02bsu030_u:2637: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya vihārasyānutsargaḥ yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihārāya //
T02bsu030_u:2638: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
T02bsu030_u:2639: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti /
T02bsu030_u:2640: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati, śrutvā cādhimokṣyanti abhinandiṣyanti,
T02bsu030_u:2641: bhūtasaṃjñāṃ cotpādayiṣyanti, teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi - niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā -
T02bsu030_u:2642: mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā, anyāni ca kuśalamūlāni parigṛhṇantīti
T02bsu030_u:2644: gamiṣyati, kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ
T02bsu030_u:2645: buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ, atha ca punarveditavyametat - āsannā hyete vyākaraṇasya, nacireṇaite saṃmukhaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyanta iti //
T02bsu030_u:2647: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante, niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā hyete sattvā
T02bsu030_u:2649: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
T02bsu030_u:2651: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti, sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti, śīlaṃ ca rakṣanti, nihatamānāśca bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2652: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca
T02bsu030_u:2653: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti, kṣāntisaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
T02bsu030_u:2654: vīryadhyānapratiṣṭhitāḥ prajñayā samanvāgatāśca bhavanti, maitrī ca sattvānāmantike utpādayanti, sattvāṃśca śīle samādāpayanti,
T02bsu030_u:2655: adhipatisaṃvartanīyaṃ ca karmopacinvanti, veditavyametat - acirādete cakravartirājyaṃ kārayiṣyanti iti /
T02bsu030_u:2656: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
T02bsu030_u:2658: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato 'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati, tatraivaṃ veditavyam - cakravartī cāyaṃ bhaviṣyati, kṣipraṃ cāsya sapta ratnāni prādurbhaviṣyantīti /
T02bsu030_u:2659: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
T02bsu030_u:2661: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca
T02bsu030_u:2662: bhaviṣyanti, udārādhimuktikāśca bhaviṣyanti, pratikūlasaṃjñā caiṣāṃ mānuṣyake ātmabhāve saṃtiṣṭhate, śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti, mahājanasya ca kṛtyakāriṇo bhavanti, devopapattiṃ cākāṅkṣanti, veditavyametat -
T02bsu030_u:2663: kṣipramete cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ sahavratāyopapatsyante, tatra cādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyanti
T02bsu030_u:2664: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate, prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ, na cādharmarāgaraktā bhavanti, na viṣamarāgaraktā bhavanti,
T02bsu030_u:2665: devaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ cākāṅkṣanti, veditavyametat - acirādete aprakampyaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāmaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kariṣyanti, śakrāśca bhaviṣyanti devānāmindrā iti /
T02bsu030_u:2666: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate, niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmaiśvaryādhipativaśavartitāmanuprāpsyatīti //
T02bsu030_u:2667: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti, veditavyametat - kṣipramete brahmaloke upapatsyanta iti
T02bsu030_u:2668: / evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya (Vaidya 70) kasyacid bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśa upanaṃsyate, veditavyamidam - kṣipramayaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyatīti //
T02bsu030_u:2669: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati, anupūrveṇa ca pravarṣati,
T02bsu030_u:2670: devenābhiṣyandamānā uparyupari udakaṃ pravarṣanti, yenotsāhaṃ bahavo 'nugacchanti /
T02bsu030_u:2672: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati, upariṣṭācca
T02bsu030_u:2673: udakamuhyate, yathā nimnāni ca sthalāni saṃtarpayati, evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī upariṣṭānmeghairabhiṣyanditā satī tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnābhiṣyandayati
T02bsu030_u:2674: / te 'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti, tadā ceyaṃ mahāpṛthivī manojñagandhamutsṛjati
T02bsu030_u:2675: / evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati /
T02bsu030_u:2676: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2677: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati, asyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate, veditavyametat suvikrāntavikrāmin acireṇāyaṃ bodhisattvo 'bhiṣyanditaḥ sarvajñajñānena, sarvajñajñānaṃ
T02bsu030_u:2679: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye 'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ, te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti /
T02bsu030_u:2680: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati, asyāṃ na śikṣiṣyante, sarve te mahādharmadhārāḥ pravarṣanti, yābhiḥ sarvasattvān dharmadānena
T02bsu030_u:2682: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ
T02bsu030_u:2683: parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti, sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti
T02bsu030_u:2684: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati, sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim //
T02bsu030_u:2685: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā, nityaṃ tatra sarvamudakaṃ samavasarati, evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo
T02bsu030_u:2686: hastagato bhaviṣyati, niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2689: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ
T02bsu030_u:2691: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati, ihābhyudgacchan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ
T02bsu030_u:2693: sarvasattvānāṃ ca dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati, sarvasattvānāṃ ca puṇyakṣetraviśuddhiṃ gacchati, sarvasattvānāṃ cābhigamanīyo bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2697: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
T02bsu030_u:2698: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
T02bsu030_u:2699: sarvaśikṣāśca samādāya abhyudgacchati, sarvaśikṣāṇāṃ ca deśayitā bhavati,
T02bsu030_u:2700: sarvaśikṣāṇāṃ ca abhivāhayitā bhavati, asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin
T02bsu030_u:2701: śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca /
T02bsu030_u:2702: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'nuttarāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2707: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā, saṃskṛte vā asaṃkṛte vā, sāsrave vā anāsrave vā, sāvadye vā anavadye vā /
T02bsu030_u:2709: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2710: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena /
T02bsu030_u:2736: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bandhanaṃ nopalabhyate /
T02bsu030_u:2739: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā, api tu yadevaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2744: nātra kaścidupalabhyate, yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā badhyeta vā /
T02bsu030_u:2745: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā, tena asaṅga ityucyate /
T02bsu030_u:2752: yaśca asakto 'baddhaḥ, kutastasya muktiḥ? yaśca na sajjate na badhyate, mukto 'sau visaṃyuktaḥ śītībhūto vipramuktaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2757: / evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ
T02bsu030_u:2760: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām /
T02bsu030_u:2761: svayamimaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrānirdeśamadhiṣṭhāsyāmi, na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum //
T02bsu030_u:2762: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam -
T02bsu030_u:2763: śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne saṃkṣīṇakāle imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītaṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ prajñāpāramitāprabhavaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhānaṃ dhārayitum, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitum? evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat - śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ prajñāpāramitāpūrvaṃgamaṃ prajñāpāramitāprabhavaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratiṣṭhānaṃ dhārayitum, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitum kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati, yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
T02bsu030_u:2764: viṣamalobhalubdhā viṣamarāgaraktā adharmarāgaraktā īrṣyālobhaparītacetasaḥ krodhanāścaṇḍāḥ paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino 'dharmacāriṇaḥ
T02bsu030_u:2765: kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo 'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ mukharāḥ pragalbhā antarhṛdayapraticchannapāpakarmāṇaḥ utsadarāgadveṣamohā avidyāṇḍakoṣatamomohāndhakārābhibhūtā mārapakṣānukūlacāriṇaḥ pratyarthikāśca bhaviṣyanti, asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya
T02bsu030_u:2766: dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti, atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum, ye ca tasminnantakāle
T02bsu030_u:2768: eṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitukāmā, aśaṭhā ṛjavo 'māyāvinaḥ, ye jīvitamapi parityajeyuḥ, na punareṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyarthikā bhaveyuḥ, nāpīmān dharmān pratikṣipeyuḥ, nopyebhyo dharmebhyaḥ parāṅmukhā bhaveyuḥ,
T02bsu030_u:2769: teṣāmarthaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, utsāhaṃ ca dāsyāmaḥ, eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ, samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ //
T02bsu030_u:2770: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma, mārasya ca pāpīyaso 'smin
T02bsu030_u:2772: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma, yathāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsrāhasro lokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
T02bsu030_u:2777: puṣpairbhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma, divyāni ca cīvarāṇi kṣipanti sma,
T02bsu030_u:2778: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ - mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
T02bsu030_u:2779: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca /
T02bsu030_u:2780: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo 'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam /
T02bsu030_u:2781: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, uttīrṇāste bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu030_u:2782: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
T02bsu030_u:2785: evametatsuvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat, yathaite devaputrā vāco bhāṣante /
T02bsu030_u:2786: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena
T02bsu030_u:2787: ye 'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti
T02bsu030_u:2788: vācayiṣyanti, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, agatistatra mārasya pāpīyaso bhaviṣyati, anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2792: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ
T02bsu030_u:2796: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā, na te koṭṭarājñāṃ paricaryāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2799: teṣāṃ ca abhyudgacchanti paribhogāya upasthānaparicaryāyai, cakravartināṃ hi rājñāṃ paribhogāya bhavanti /
T02bsu030_u:2800: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti /
T02bsu030_u:2801: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin (Vaidya 74) upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ /
T02bsu030_u:2802: na te manuṣyāṇāmupabhogāya saṃkrāmanti, nāpi te manuṣyāṇāṃ
T02bsu030_u:2803: darśanāyopasaṃkrāmanti, nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti, devājāneyānāṃ te nāgarājānaḥ paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti /
T02bsu030_u:2804: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro 'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā, tathā tathā cāpi
T02bsu030_u:2806: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti, yaduta vācanatayā deśanatayā saṃprakāśanatayā, teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti, mahatīṃ ca dharmaprītimeṣu
T02bsu030_u:2809: bhaviṣyanti, asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti, kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti, te te manuṣyendrā manuṣyājāneyāḥ parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti /
T02bsu030_u:2812: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
T02bsu030_u:2814: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya //
T02bsu030_u:2822: yā sarvajñatayā nayatyupaśamaṃ śāntaiṣiṇaḥ śrāvakān yā mārgajñatayā jagaddhitakṛtāṃ lokārthasaṃpādikā
T02bsu030_u:2823: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatās tasyai śrāvakabodhisattvagaṇino buddhasya mātre namaḥ // 1 //
T02bsu030_u:2824: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T02bsu030_u:2825: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ // 2 //
